long_description: White Musk is a comfortable and velvety female fragrance, dedicated to every woman and perfect for every moment and occasion. It opens with notes of ylang-ylang, galbanum and basil, followed by the heart of jasmine, rose, musk and lily,and settling at the base dominated by musk along with jasmine, rose, iris, amber, patchouli, vetiver, peach, oakmoss and vanilla. Besides an intensive 30 ml eau de perfume, White Musk is available as 15 and 30 ml White Musk Perfume Oil and 30 and 60 ml eau de toilette.

perfume_name: Volume 2: Precision and Grace The Beautiful Mind Series
short_description: Volume 2: Precision and Grace  by  The Beautiful Mind Series  is a Floral Fruity fragrance for women and men.  Volume 2: Precision and Grace  was launched in 2015. Top notes are Pear, Lemon, Mandarin Orange and Bergamot; middle notes are Osmanthus, Plum, Freesia, Egyptian Jasmine, Pink Pepper, Violet, Mimosa and Rose; base notes are Musk, Sandalwood, Moss, Amber, Castoreum and Myrrh.
long_description:
"Dance is poetry made visible, fragrance is a dance of molecules invisible. 
 Internationally-fÃªted ballet dancer, Polina Semionova, is Schoenâ€™s creative partner for the new fragrance in the series, Precision & Grace. 
 â€œI was fascinated by what goes on in the mind of a great dancer while sheâ€™s dancing,â€ says Schoen, â€˜in the precision she must have to express the grace.â€ 
 â€œWithout intelligent work, there is no result,â€ explains Semionova. â€œeven if you have a great gift. The precision only comes with hours of work in the studio. Then, when I go on stage, I donâ€™t think anymore. I release myself to the music. I fly.â€ 
 The fragrance is balanced between uplifting fruity notes and powdery florals. â€œI wanted to have pear and plum because they remind me of summer in the Russian countryside of my childhood,â€ says Semionova. â€œWhen I smell pear and plum it makes me smile.â€ 
 The top note of Williams pear springs out of the bottle with its crisp, juicy greenness. The heart of the fragrance is an unusual fruity-floral accord of Egyptian jasmine (the fruitiest of the jasmines) with plum. Harmonising with this key accord are airy florals such as mimosa, freesia and osmanthus (a white blossom with an apricot note). 
 â€œFor me Precision & Grace connotes lightness, the gossamar layers of the classical ballerinaâ€™s costume,â€ says Schoen, â€œand then the warmth of the body as she dances.â€ 
 The drydown is warm and velvety, based on woods and musks. â€œIâ€™ve used real sandalwood because itâ€™s more complex and animalic than the synthetic versions, better able to express the heat of the body in motion.â€ 
 Schoenâ€™s signature of schinus molle, or pink pepper, also features. 
 â€œWhen you first smell Precision & Grace itâ€™s like a breeze, so light and feminine,â€ says Semionova. â€œBut then there is this unusual note that I love, the pepper. This adds something deeper that gives a core of strength to the fragrance. Itâ€™s like the ballet itself: without the hidden strength, you canâ€™t make it light.â€ 
 The packaging is an impression of the meditative state of a dancerâ€™s brain while she is performing. 
 â€œThe dots and triangles are a series of placements, they represent the precise steps she must take,â€ explains Paul White of Me Company. The colour flows reflect a different way of mapping balletic gesture. â€œDance is precise, but itâ€™s also semi-airborne. The pulses of colour reflect the flux of the dance, almost like motion capture trails. They represent the dancerâ€™s freedom, her joy." - a note from the brand.

short_description: Black Musk  by  The Body Shop  is a Woody Floral Musk fragrance for women.  Black Musk  was launched in 2015. Black Musk was created by Cecile Matton and Ralf Schwieger. Top notes are Pear, Pink Pepper and Bergamot; middle notes are Licorice, Heliotrope and Ylang-Ylang; base notes are Black Vanilla Husk, Chocolate, Black Musk, Patchouli and Vetiver.
long_description:
In October 2015, The Body Shop is launching its new fragrance Black Musk, following the lines of White Musk from1981 and Red Musk from 2014. Black Musk is announced as the darkest and the most sensual of all the scents. It represents a contrast between light, sweet flavors and dark musk with oriental woods. The creation is signed by Cecile Matton and Ralf Schwieger.
 
 
 The opening of the composition symbolizes desire with notes of sweet pear infused with pink pepper and bergamot. Intense aroma of heliotrope, which varies between marzipan and almond, is interspersed with ylang-ylang and aphrodisiac notes of licorice. Hot black vanilla, musk black, earthy patchouli, vetiver and chocolate end the composition. 
 
Black Musk is available as 60 ml Eau de Toilette, 50 ml Eau de Parfum and 20 ml Perfume Oil.

short_description: The Hope  by  Thameen  is a Oriental Woody fragrance for women and men.  The Hope  was launched in 2015. Top notes are Cinnamon, Cloves and Myrrh; middle notes are Agarwood (Oud), Cedar and Immortelle; base notes are Black Amber, Labdanum, Vetiver and Musk.
long_description: â€œDescribed as the size of a pigeonâ€™s egg, it is a distinctive grey blue in hue, and also emanates a rare red phosphorescent glow. The gem has been worn by sultans, queens, aristocracy and socialites; most notably Queen Marie Antoinette who wore it as a hairpin, and its last private owner, the flamboyant heiress Evalyn Walsh Mclean. It was the inspiration for the â€˜Heart of The Oceanâ€™ in the film Titanic and provides the inspiration for the iridescent fragrance. Opening with the warm radiance of cinnamon bark, myrrh and cloves conjure the diamondâ€™s legendary fiery red glow. A woody shimmer of cedar and oud wood is at the heart, layered with the multi-faceted, honeyed brilliance of the immortelle flower. A base of black amber, labdanum resin (from the Mediterranean rock rose), musk and vetiver, exude pure glamour and sophistication. Decadentâ€ â€” press release of the brand.

short_description: Sparkling Opal  by  Thameen  is a fragrance for women.  Sparkling Opal  was launched in 2020. Top notes are Saffron, Nutmeg and Pepper; middle notes are Orris Root, Agarwood (Oud), Rose, Cinnamon, Jasmine, Labdanum and Cedar; base notes are Vanilla, Amyris, Sandalwood, Leather, Guaiac Wood, Musk and Cedar.
long_description: "Taking its name from the precious stone, Sparkling Opal perfume extract from Thameen delivers an olfactory experience of opulence. Saffron and nutmeg bring spice, while jasmine and orris infuse the delicate touch of florals and woody notes of sandalwood and amaryris complete the scent with the earthy fragrance of forests." - a note from the brand.

short_description: The Cora  by  Thameen  is a Oriental Floral fragrance for women and men.  The Cora  was launched in 2017. Top notes are Wisteria, Bulgarian Rose, Jasmine and Magnolia; middle notes are Benzoin, Carnation, Lily-of-the-Valley and Vanilla; base notes are Patchouli, White Musk and Amber.
long_description: "Inspired by the rare gemstone, â€˜The Coraâ€™ is a bright, golden, multi-faceted spectrum of rare and beautiful ingredients as mesmerising and timeless as its namesake." - a note from the brand.

short_description: Royal Sapphire  by  Thameen  is a fragrance for women and men.  Royal Sapphire  was launched in 2019. Top notes are Mandarin Orange and Bergamot; middle notes are Orange Blossom and Jasmine; base notes are Amber, Patchouli, Woody Notes and Oakmoss.

Regent Leather  by  Thameen  is a Oriental fragrance for women and men.  Regent Leather  was launched in 2016. Top note is Lemon; middle notes are Saffron, Cardamom, Jasmine and Rose; base notes are Vanilla, Animal notes, Gurjan balsam, Labdanum, Cedar, Patchouli and Musk.
long_description:
â€œTraditionally, Thameen selects a rare gemstone as the inspiration for each of its fragrances and it is only fitting that, for this project, they have chosen what is considered to be the finest diamond in the world â€“ The Regent Diamond. Over 300 years old, the Regent Diamond is 141 carats, cushion-cut and its colour is â€˜of the first waterâ€™ that is, perfectly white and virtually flawless. 
 The fragrance exudes luxury and privilege, opening with the daring juxtaposition of smooth vanilla and sharp lemon. At the heart, the perfumer has cleverly conjured a remarkable leather scent reminiscent of the interior of the Rolls Royce, a cocoon of craftsmanship that envelopes the wearer. The tone speaks of power and strong will, supported by spices and resins including a fine saffron and deep resinous labdanum. The base is glossy, a perfumed patina of elegant and timeless gurjum, cedar and patchouli. Regent Leather is hypnotic and has, in the manner of Rolls Royce, been â€˜engineeredâ€™ â€“ enabling the finest ingredients to revolve throughout the dry-down, thus the journey is both surprising and familiar by degreeâ€ â€” press release of the brand.

short_description: Sceptre  by  Thameen  is a fragrance for women and men.  Sceptre  was launched in 2018. Top notes are Pink Pepper, Madagascar Cloves and Coriander; middle notes are Peach, Ylang-Ylang, Wisteria and Patchouli; base notes are Myrrh, Amber, Ambergris and Siam Benzoin.
long_description: "The Sovereignâ€™s Sceptre is a unique creation of precious jewels set in gold, symbolising royal authority and chivalry. Myrrh is the signature note of this fragrance, a divine ingredient at the heart of royal ceremony across the ages. Blended with warming amber, this exquisite scent truly reflects the splendour of the Sceptre." - a note from the brand.

short_description: Peregrina  by  Thameen  is a Oriental Floral fragrance for women and men.  Peregrina  was launched in 2019. Top notes are Damask Rose, Gardenia, Jasmine and Lily-of-the-Valley; middle notes are Caramel, Vanilla, Amber, Myrrh and Ylang-Ylang; base notes are Amber, Powdery Notes and White Musk.
long_description: "As captivating and sensual as a tropical garden on a warm summerâ€™s night, this perfume offers an enticing, gentle sweetness which brings out the rich aromas of the east. At its heart, the notes of opulent myrrh, alluring vanilla and sensual ylang ylang flowers are carefully blended with bright floral notes of damask rose, jasmine and gardenia that give this extrait de parfum its vibrancy. It is grounded on a strong base of amber and white musk, which tactfully presents itself throughout the dry down." -Brand Description.

short_description: Patiala  by  Thameen  is a fragrance for women and men.  Patiala  was launched in 2019. Top notes are Aldehydes and Citruses; middle notes are Rose and Orange Blossom; base notes are Amber, Musk and Oakmoss.
long_description:
"Inspired by the mysterious Patiala necklace of India, this new fragrance from British niche fragrance brand Thameen London has been created to elate and energise those who wear it. Like the necklace, Patiala is a manifestation of true craftsmanship and a mark of true sophistication. 
 Patiala opens bright and strong, with a juxtaposition of fresh citrus and the intensifying sweetness of aldehyde. At the heart of this scent lie piquant, floral aromas: the notes of orange flower and wild roses are supported by the warm richness of the amber, the fresh coolness of the moss and sensuous musk." - a note from the brand.

short_description: RiviÃ¨re  by  Thameen  is a Oriental Spicy fragrance for women and men.  RiviÃ¨re  was launched in 2016. The nose behind this fragrance is Julia Rodriguez Pastor. Top notes are Saffron and Black Pepper; middle notes are Turkish Rose, Sage and Carnation; base notes are Leather and Cypriol Oil or Nagarmotha.
long_description:
â€œOne of the most famous Riviereâ€™s belonged to Queen Mary and consisted of 34 old-cut diamonds. She subsequently gifted the necklace to her granddaughter, Princess Margaret, and it was sold at Christieâ€™s for almost Â£1 million in 2006. The new fragrance, â€˜Riviereâ€™, from luxury British fragrance house Thameen is, like its namesake, dedicated to balance and a flawless progression of rare and sparkling ingredients combined to adorn the skin. 
 Shimmering at the top, spiced notes of Indian black pepper and Persian saffron meld mellifluously into cinnamon from Ceylon and a luminous lemon blossom accord. This dazzling opening segues into a deep, faceted heart of Russian clary sage over Turkish rose and carnation, polished with a warm, burnished patchouli from Indonesia. The iridescent base of golden amber and oud, infused with soft, opulent Indian cypriol and a sun drenched leather enrich this jewel with a dark resinous glow. Riviere conveys a sophisticated brilliance â€“ its elegant simplicity disguising a meticulous construct. An olfactory masterclass for perfume perfectionistsâ€ â€” press release of the brand.

short_description: Noorolain Taif  by  Thameen  is a Oriental Floral fragrance for women.  Noorolain Taif  was launched in 2013. The nose behind this fragrance is Alexandre Illan. Top notes are Pink Pepper, Coriander and Black Pepper; middle notes are Taif Rose, Turkish Rose and Jasmine; base notes are Cashmere Wood, Agarwood (Oud) and Amber.
long_description:
â€œIt is the name given to the 60 carat pink diamond mounted in the Noorolain Tiara, created for the Iranian royal wedding in 1958 and designed for Empress Farah Pahlavi by Harry Winston. This inspired Thameen to aim to create the most beautiful scent to behold. 
 The jewels of Baie rose pink peppers and their cousinâ€™s coriander and black pepper create the surround for the central setting of Taif Rose, Jasmine and Turkish Rose. The triumvirate of florals mingle with the gilded base of Agarwood, Oriental and Cashmere wood. Mesmerisingâ€ â€” press release of the brand.

short_description: Imperial Crown  by  Thameen  is a fragrance for women and men.  Imperial Crown  was launched in 2018. Top notes are elemi, Black Pepper and Pink Pepper; middle notes are Olibanum and Leather; base notes are Guaiac Wood and Patchouli.
long_description: "Adorned with precious jewels and diamonds, purple velvet and regal ermine, the Imperial Crown is the very symbol of splendour and sovereign prestige. As the legendary kings and queens of history, this scent wreathes the wearer in ceremonial frankincense, the sublime ingredient of royal coronations." - a note from the brand.

short_description: Nassak  by  Thameen  is a Oriental Spicy fragrance for women and men.  Nassak  was launched in 2014.
long_description:
â€œThe British East India Company acquired the gem and sold it to the British Jeweller Rundell and Bridge in 1818, when it was re-cut for the handle of the 1st Marquis of Westminsterâ€™s dress sword. American jeweller Harry Winston transformed the diamond to its present, exquisite, emerald-cut shape in 1940 and the Nassak Diamond has since been sold to an American trucking magnate in 1970 for Â£500,000 and is believed to be currently owned by Rober Mouawad. 
 Nassak belies the cool, blue colour of the diamond, instead reflecting the depth and dazzling light contained within the stone. The scent opens with a bright, glowing, opulent combination of Taif rose and saffron, warm yet iridescent â€“ the ultimate extravagance. This segues seamlessly into a glossy heart of plum â€“ the bitter-sweetness a perfect balance for sparkling cedar and the fizz of sandalwood. At the base, a gilded triumvirate of vanilla, tonka and musk cushion the scent on a pillow, deep and textured â€“ and finally the merest echo of ambergrisâ€ â€” press release of the brand.

short_description: Moon of Baroda  by  Thameen  is a Oriental Woody fragrance for women and men.  Moon of Baroda  was launched in 2013. Top note is Cedar; middle note is Amber; base note is Sandalwood.
long_description:
â€œIts rich history took it through the hands of Empress Marie Theresa of Austria to Marilyn Monroe, worn for her famous performance of â€œDiamonds are a Girlâ€™s Best Friendâ€ in Gentlemen Prefer Blondes. 
 Hypnotic Lebanese cedar is one of the most beautiful and ancient ingredients in perfumery. The Spicy, resinous oil is identical in hue to the gemstone with a piquant, cognac-laced intensity that invigorates the emotions and warms the senses. A glowing amber heart flows over woody, sweet sandalwood from Mysore â€“ the finest of its kind on earth â€“ intense and spiritual in mood. Finally, a double dose of cedar brings the fanciful landscape to a close. Luminousâ€ â€” press release of the brand.

short_description: Carved Oud  by  Thameen  is a Oriental Woody fragrance for women and men.  Carved Oud  was launched in 2013. Top notes are Guatemalan Cardamom, Cypress, Cypriol Oil or Nagarmotha and Pink Pepper; middle notes are Agarwood (Oud), Cedar, Patchouli and Iris; base notes are Musk, Sandalwood, Vanilla, Haitian Vetiver and Amber.
long_description:
â€œIndian Royalty were considered somewhere between man and God and this ritual adornment with perfumes and jewels created something of a super-human presence. 
 The name itself comes from temple designs and decorations and the image of the women, once decorated, as a perfect, carved goddess. A unique oud was selected from the South of India, one of the highest quality oud oils, it is both angular and edgy. 
 The unique oud from the South of India, angular and sweetly edgy, dictates this heavenly scent. The top note blends beautifully with cedar wood and guaiac. 
 At the base, a pure patchouli and sun-baked vetivert add depth and warmth polished off by a smooth, temperate musk. Divineâ€ â€” press release of the brand.
top_notes: Guatemalan Cardamom,Cypress,Cypriol Oil or Nagarmotha,Pink Pepper

short_description: Green Pearl  by  Thameen  is a Aromatic fragrance for women and men.  Green Pearl  was launched in 2016. Top notes are Bergamot, Apple, Neroli and Mandarin Orange; middle notes are Green Notes, Tea, Pepper and Artemisia; base notes are Musk, Oakmoss and Tonka Bean.
long_description:
â€œThis naturally phosphorescent mineral which literally glows in the dark is found only in China and is the most valuable in the world, highly prized by the Chinese as just touching it is said to bring health, great prosperity and good luck! As hard and rarer than the finest grade diamonds, the largest green pearl is 1.6 meters in diameter and valued at 3.1 billion dollars! 
 Green Pearl opens with a biting green note of apple set aglow by bright citrus accords of mandarin, neroli and bergamot. At the heart, green leaves, soft and rain-soaked part to reveal green tea and the bitter-vert of Artemisia, further animated by a dusting of pepper. At the base, lustrous tonka sits atop oak moss and the ambery gleam of musk. Green Pearl is vivid olfactory gem infused with verdant incandescence. It is eminently wearable and will cut effortlessly through heat and humidity with an energising, cleansing radianceâ€ â€” press release of the brand.

short_description: Lapidus Pour Homme  by  Ted Lapidus  is a Oriental fragrance for men.  Lapidus Pour Homme  was launched in 1987. The nose behind this fragrance is Martin Gras. Top notes are Pineapple, Lavender, Artemisia, Juniper Berries, Lemon, Basil and Bergamot; middle notes are Honey, Incense, Pine Tree, Rose, Brazilian Rosewood, Jasmine, Caraway, Orris Root, Lily-of-the-Valley and Petitgrain; base notes are Tobacco, Patchouli, Oakmoss, Musk, Amber, Sandalwood, Tonka Bean and Cedar.
Amber Room  by  Thameen  is a Oriental fragrance for women and men.  Amber Room  was launched in 2013.
long_description:
â€œGlowing at the heart of Catherine Palace near St Petersburg, the chamber was lined entirely with amber panels backed with gold leaf and mirrors. 
 When lit with more than five hundred candles it was reputed to glow like trapped sunshine and fiery gold. Created by melting together amber, Cognac and honey, its history and brilliance has inspired the creation of this fragrance. 
 Smoky, warm and glowing, the heady amber, as seductive as its inspiration, is lit with Italian bergamot, sensual Turkish rose and warmed through with spices, cinnamon and cedar wood. Glowingâ€ â€” press release of the brand.

short_description: Kiani  by  Thameen  is a Woody Spicy fragrance for women and men.  Kiani  was launched in 2017. The nose behind this fragrance is Alexandre Illan. Top notes are Citron, Sage, elemi and Green Pepper; middle notes are Lavender, Ginger and Cumin; base notes are Vetiver, Cedar, Sandalwood, Guaiac Wood and Musk.
long_description:
"Thameen Kiani is named for and inspired by the Kiani Crown of Persia. Spiced sophistication is at the heart of the Kiani as ginger and cumin compliment an elegantly tailored French lavender. The Kiani fragrance is exciting, radiant and spiritually uplifting â€“ divine and glorious! 
 The fragrance is appropriately opulent and opens with sparklingÂ cedratÂ over the intense emerald bite of sage and green pepper. Spiced sophistication is at the heart of the Kiani as ginger and cumin compliment an elegantly tailored French lavender. Velvety woods wrapped in a regal musk unveil its earthy yet ardent base. The combination is imbued with a rather worldly, international style that is both seductive and urbane." - a note from the brand.

short_description: Maali Al Wazeer Misk  by  Tayyib  is a Floral Woody Musk fragrance for women. Top notes are Floral Notes and Rose; middle notes are Hibiscus and Violet Leaf; base notes are Cedar, Vanilla Orchid, Musk and Amber.
L'Oudh  by  Tauer Perfumes  is a Oriental Woody fragrance for women and men.  L'Oudh  was launched in 2018. The nose behind this fragrance is Andy Tauer.
long_description:
"L'oudh is a fragrance that builds around a natural oudh essential oil from Laos. There is no olfactory pyramid as the fragrance is not composed around head, heart and body notes. L'oudh accord, with natural oudh and cypriol , to name two ingredients, is central to the fragrance. All other notes and ingredients are there to support a naturalistic, wild, untamed oudh. The oudh oil from Laos was imported with an offical CITES license." 
 Notes: Oudh, castoreum, tobacco, musk, vetiver, morile, cistus, patchouli, myrrh, sandalwood, amber gris. 
 Natural ingredients: Â Rose and jasmin absolute, oudh oil, cistus oil, styrax, Â tobacco, sandalwood (s. alba), myrrh oil, patchouli, vetiver, cypriol. 
 Available as a 50 ml EDP.Â

short_description: L'Eau  by  Tauer Perfumes  is a Citrus fragrance for women and men.  L'Eau  was launched in 2017. The nose behind this fragrance is Andy Tauer. Top notes are Lemon, Sweet Orange and Bergamot; middle notes are Lemon Blossom and Iris; base notes are Ambergris, Musk, Woody Notes and Sandalwood.
long_description:
"Lâ€™Eau is inspired by a lemontree in bloom on Andy Tauerâ€™s veranda in crisp Zurich morning air.
Highest quality ingredients, well balanced, lasting : Lâ€™eau by Tauer is a fresh unisex eau de parfum. "  
 Clean lemon blossom joined with crisp shimmering iris flowers.Bright musks and amber gris with a hint of timber and sandalwood. 
 50 ml EDP.

short_description: Wonderstruck  by  Taylor Swift  is a Floral Fruity fragrance for women.  Wonderstruck  was launched in 2011. The nose behind this fragrance is Olivier Gillotin. Top notes are Raspberry, Blackberry, Tea, Apple Blossom and Freesia; middle notes are Vanille, Honeysuckle and Hibiscus; base notes are Peach, Sandalwood, Amber and Musk.
long_description:
Wonderstruck is the first fragrance from the young American pop - country singer Taylor Swift, launched in cooperation with the cosmetic company Elizabeth Arden. The perfume is created by Olivier Gillotin of Givaudan. 
 
 Wonderstruck is named after the lyrics from the song "Enchanted": "I'm wonderstruck, blushing all the way home," which tell about the feeling and the impression you get when you first meet someone you like. Taylor hopes that her fragrance will be an essential part of many impressions and first meetings. 
 
The fragrance composition is described as a charming gourmand â€“ floral with sparkling fruity tones on a wooden background. The top notes are raspberry, dewberry, green tea, freesia and apple blossom. The heart features sweet vanilla along with sundrenched honeysuckle and white hibiscus. Notes of golden amber, musk, sandalwood and peach are in the base. 
 
 Wonderstruck will be available from October in 50 ml and 100 ml bottles with an accompanying collection for body care.

short_description: Les AnnÃ©es 25  by  Tauer Perfumes  is a Floral Woody Musk fragrance for women and men.  Les AnnÃ©es 25  was launched in 2018. The nose behind this fragrance is Andy Tauer. Top notes are Citruses, Ginger, Spices and Nutmeg; middle notes are Iris, Rose and Ylang-Ylang; base notes are Benzoin, Musk, Tonka Bean and Woody Notes.
long_description:
Created to celebrate the 25th anniversary of the brand. 
 Notes: BIG citrus, spices (nutmeg), ginger 
Rose, powdery iris, ylang 
Tonka, full body of woods, musky benzoin. 
Limited to around 500 bottles.

short_description: Black Soul  by  Ted Lapidus  is a Woody Spicy fragrance for men.  Black Soul  was launched in 2009. The nose behind this fragrance is Alexandra Carlin.
long_description: Black Soul arrives on the market in August 2009 and is created of mint, cardamom, neroli, bergamot, cinnamon, saffron, tolu balm, resins, Guaiac wood, Chinese cedar and musk. The fragrance is available as 30, 50 and 100ml edt.

perfume_name: Au Coeur du DÃ©sert Tauer Perfumes
short_description: Au Coeur du DÃ©sert  by  Tauer Perfumes  is a Oriental Woody fragrance for women and men.  Au Coeur du DÃ©sert  was launched in 2016. The nose behind this fragrance is Andy Tauer.

06 Incense Rose  by  Tauer Perfumes  is a Oriental Floral fragrance for women.  06 Incense Rose  was launched in 2008. The nose behind this fragrance is Andy Tauer. Top notes are Bulgarian Rose, Clementine, Cardamom and Bergamot; middle notes are Castoreum and Orris Root; base notes are Incense, Myrrh, Resins, Texas Cedar, Labdanum, Vetiver and Patchouli.
long_description:
Incense Rose is an oriental floral fragrance, launched in 2008. 
 Mysterious incense notes are surrounded with luminous citruses and roses, with dark balsamic resins. 
 While opening, Incense Rose brings notes of mystical and dark rose, followed by bergamot and clementine essential oil combined with cardamom and Bulgarian rose. The heart reveals a new and mysterious world with orris, dark and exuberant at the same time, combined with castor and woodsy accords. 
 The base introduces cedar from Texas, vetiver, balsamic and dark Myrrh, patchouli, natural frankincense (extrait of CO2 Boswellia Serrata, already mentioned in description of Incense Extreme fragrance), labdanum and ambrein. The fragrance is available as 50ml (1.7 fl.oz.) EDP. The bottle was created by Dezso Bodi, while the fragrance by Andy Tauer.

short_description: 09 Orange Star  by  Tauer Perfumes  is a Oriental Floral fragrance for women and men.  09 Orange Star  was launched in 2010. The nose behind this fragrance is Andy Tauer. Top notes are Mandarin Orange and Clementine; middle notes are Orange Blossom and Lemongrass; base notes are Ambergris, Tonka Bean and Vanilla.
long_description:
Orange Star is the ninth fragrance by Andy Tauer, created on the contrast of fragile orange blossom and thick amber notes. 
 Fresh mandarins and clementines open the composition, orange blossom and shiny lemongrass are in the heart. The oriental base is composed of ambergris, tonka beans and soft vanilla.

perfume_name: 02 L'Air du Desert Marocain Tauer Perfumes
short_description: 02 L'Air du Desert Marocain  by  Tauer Perfumes  is a Oriental Spicy fragrance for women and men.  02 L'Air du Desert Marocain  was launched in 2005. The nose behind this fragrance is Andy Tauer. Top notes are Coriander, Cumin, Petitgrain and Lavender; middle notes are Labdanum, Birch, Jasmine and Geranium; base notes are Amber, Cedar, Vetiver, Patchouli and Oakmoss.
long_description:
L`Air du Desert Marocain was made as a lighter version of Andy's previous Le Maroc Pour Elle. One of the most popular in the line. The fragrance is composed of spicy oriental notes, inspired by Saharan desert in the moonlight, a Moroccan night. 
 
 The top is combined of coriander, cumin with a hint of petitgrain. The heart features rock rose and jasmine. The base includes cedar, vetiver and ambergris.

short_description: Zahra  by  Swiss Arabian  is a Oriental Floral fragrance for women.
long_description:
"Each precious droplet of Zahra encapsulates the breath-taking beauty of nature. 
 Opening with an opulent feast of fruits: ripe, juicy and inviting, Zahra is a refreshing and uplifting scent for a cold night. The fruits offer their honeyed sweetness until they merge seamlessly from fruit to flower. A sparkle of aldehydic notes offer white ozonic clouds of scent across a blue sky, whilst rich gold-red saffron provides its precious essence to the majestic rose. Embraced by alluring musk and a glimmering golden heart of agarwood, Zahra is the perfect unforgettable aura that you have just made your own. 
 Zahra is a concentrated perfume oil for women. It is ideally suited to cooler nights.Â The beauty of nature. The scent of you." - a note from the brand.

short_description: Sandalia  by  Swiss Arabian  is a Oriental Woody fragrance for women and men.
long_description: "Sandalia is a remarkably authentic distillation of the fragrant Sandalwood tree. The legendary aroma of the Sandalwood has captivated and enthralled perfume lovers for centuries. Its highly sought-after scent is a delight to the senses and instils a calming inner peace that is said to help wearers with their stress, depression and low self-esteem." - a note from the brand.

short_description: Rasheeqa  by  Swiss Arabian  is a Floral Green fragrance for women. Top notes are Rose and Green Notes; middle notes are Aldehydes, Lily-of-the-Valley and Jasmine; base notes are Sandalwood, Cedar and Musk.
long_description: "Rasheeqa is a graceful combination of dignity and beauty, exclusive to the women of the nobility. It is a personification of highest echelons of modern elegance, elusive to the masses and yet so easily attainable." - a note from the brand.

short_description: Layali  by  Swiss Arabian  is a Floral Fruity fragrance for women. Top notes are Plum, Black Currant and Orange Blossom; middle notes are Ylang-Ylang, Jasmine and Rose; base notes are Agarwood (Oud) and Amber.
long_description:
"Layali is inspired by the woman who encapsulates all that is alluring and all that enchants those who know her. 
 Layali is an intense fruity floral fragrance which showcases the precious oud in its heart. The opening of dark, juicy plum is complemented by the sheer beauty of orange flowers with its spring like nuances of green floral notes. Musky blackcurrants melt seamlessly into a feminine bouquet of flowers, with soft ylang ylang notes surrendering to roses and creamy jasmine. Into the heart of this dreamy oasis, a drop of gold slowly emerges. Cherished oud spreads its beams like sun rays, bringing warmth and intensity. It fuses with amber and brings its unique richness to the fore, embracing you in heavenly fragrance all day long. Layali is especially suited to cooler months.Â When beauty is intense, beauty is Layali." - a note from the brand.

short_description: Oud Maknoon  by  Swiss Arabian  is a Woody fragrance for women and men. Top note is Pepper; middle note is Rose; base notes are Agarwood (Oud), Amber and Musk.
long_description:
"Oud Maknoon surprises you when you least expect it! Waves of extreme freshness meet Peppery notes and fuse with mouthwatering Rosy and Spicy elements. The special mix in the base, with Agarwood, Oriental and Musk, will leave you dazzled for a very long time. 
 Oud Maknoon is unique in its ability to transform any (and we mean any) fragrance, even a mundane aftershave or equivalent, into a uniquely exotic and woody one! While it is a stand alone marvel, in one's own right, it is perfect for layering if you have never done so before; Simply apply it first, then put on any other fragrance." - a note from the brand.

short_description: Kashkha  by  Swiss Arabian  is a Oriental Spicy fragrance for women. Top notes are Apple, Cinnamon and Bergamot; middle notes are Agarwood (Oud), Tagetes, Saffron, Cardamom and Cloves; base notes are Cedar, Sandalwood, Musk, Vetiver, Amber and Oak.
long_description: "Kashkha is an ode to stylish femininity, and an expression of the uninhibited, extravagant lifestyle she leads. This elegant, oriental fragrance comes in an exquisitely ornate golden bottle, placed in a plush gold satin coffret jewel case." - a note from the brand.

short_description: Jannet El Firdaus  by  Swiss Arabian  is a Oriental Fougere fragrance for women and men.

Aura  by  Swarovski  is a Oriental Floral fragrance for women.  Aura  was launched in 2011. Aura was created by Olivier Cresp and Jean-Pierre Bethouart. Top notes are Litchi and Rose; middle note is Tuberose; base notes are Pink Pepper, Musk, Benzoin and Amber.
long_description:
The composition was created by Jean-Pierre Bethouart and Olivier Cresp of Firmenich, who colored the high notes with shades of litchi fruit elements combined with floral notes of roses. In the heart of the fragrance is tuberose that emphasizes femininity, while the pink pepper tickles the imagination from the base notes, together with amber, benzoin and white musk.
 
 
The inspiration for this fragrance was definitely a light transmission game, combined with the olfactory splendor. 
 The bottles are crafted in a combination of glass and metal, cylindrical in shape and topped with asymmetrical Swarovski crystals. The liquid contained inside the elegant bottle is pink. 
 Swarovski Aura is available in very elegant flacons as 30 ml and 75 ml EDP's.

short_description: Fawah Al-Khaleej  by  Suhad Perfumes  is a Oriental Floral fragrance for women and men.  Fawah Al-Khaleej  was launched in 2014. Fawah Al-Khaleej was created by Christian Carbonnel and Suhad Al-Qenaei. Top notes are Geranium and Rose; middle notes are Agarwood (Oud) and Gurjan balsam; base notes are Patchouli, Cypriol Oil or Nagarmotha and Musk.
long_description:
Fawah Al Khaleej is a signature fragrance of the Arabian Gulf, without prejudice to her renowned philosophy in the design of perfume which consists of Eastern and Western blends in an elegant and unique style. Natural oils give this perfume a rich texture and aroma that brings alive the traditional Gulf scent. Suhad describes the perfume as "A rich blend of Spanish fragrant oils that gives off an aroma that befits Gulf royalty." 
 Top notes: Geranium & Rose. 
 Middle notes: Gurjum & Oud. 
 Base notes: Patchouli, Cypriol & Musk.

short_description: Al Wasel  by  Suhad Perfumes  is a Leather fragrance for women and men.  Al Wasel  was launched in 2014. Al Wasel was created by Christian Carbonnel and Suhad Al-Qenaei. Top notes are Saffron, Ginger, Cumin and Leather; middle notes are Jasmine, Cedar and Patchouli; base notes are Sandalwood, Vanilla, Tobacco and Musk.
long_description:
"A sensually overwhelming blend of species, wood, and leather that gently embraces the skin, covering it with a strong but sweet smell" - Suhad Al Qenaei Al Wasel, one of Suhad's latest creations, embodies the true spirit of the Emirati people in that it's named after one of Dubai's oldest and traditionally rich Emirati neighborhoods. The perfume is a blend of the finest oriental ingredients to create a luxuriously smooth perfume; one that radiates with clarity true Emirati virtues of generosity and hospitality that every Emirati can be proud of. 
 Top notes: Saffron, Ginger, Cumin, Leather. 
 Middle notes: Jasmine, Cedar, Patchouli. 
 Base: Sandalwood, Vanilla, Tobacco, Musk

short_description: Pop  by  Stella McCartney  is a Floral Woody Musk fragrance for women.  Pop  was launched in 2016. Top notes are Tomato Leaf, Green Mandarin and Violet Leaf; middle notes are Tuberose, Frangipani and Violet; base notes are Musk, Sandalwood and Cedar.
long_description:
The fashion designer Stella McCartney, the daughter of Paul and Linda McCartney, presents her third pillar fragrance called Pop, aiming at the generation of "millennials". Her first fragrance Stella from 2003 experienced a great success and many re-editions. Her other perfume launched in 2012 as L.I.L.Y., inspired by her memories of childhood. 
 Stella McCartney Pop will arrive at the end of March, 2016 as a floral - woody fragrance produced by P&G Prestige. Pop is announced as â€œa mindset that captures the free spirit of the women who wear it.â€ The scent is composed of two main notes, the synthetic molecules of tuberose and sandalwood. 
 "POP is a spirit. Itâ€™s about celebrating that exciting time when you are coming into your own. Itâ€™s about freedom, and starting your life away from judgments or labels." 
 One of the faces of the fragrance campaign is the Canadian singer Claire Elise Boucher, aka Grimes. The bottle iss designed in simply cut, pure, transparent glass with a round, vivid pink cap.The fragrance is available as an Eau de Parfum.

short_description: Stella Nude  by  Stella McCartney  is a fragrance for women.  Stella Nude  was launched in 2009. Top notes are Rose and Grapefruit; middle notes are Peony and Pink Pepper; base notes are Amber and Vanilla.
long_description:
A seductive accessory. Before getting dressed each morning, every woman selects the secret, hidden wardrobe that discreetly defines her moodâ€”her lingerie. Taking inspiration from this deeply personal and intensely feminine moment, Stella McCartney developed a new interpretation of her signature fragranceâ€”STELLA NUDE.
 
 
A natural extension of the Stella McCartney Lingerie Collection, STELLA NUDE represents the first accessory every woman puts on her bare skin when getting dressed. Evoking the delicacy and femininity of Stella McCartney lingerie, STELLA NUDE reimagines the classic rose blossom to create a more intimate moment. The fragrance opens with the sensual scents of Moroccan Rose, infused with a fresh hint of grapefruit. As the fragrance reveals itself on the skin, floral heart notes of tender white peony bloom. The striking, feminine scent is invigorated with a spicy hint of pink pepper. STELLANUDEâ€™s dry notes of Ugandan vanilla and intriguing Grey Oriental combine to create a seductive base. The fragrance illuminates subtle notes found in Stella, bringing the delicate scent to life in an intimate new way.
 
 
In addition to an Eau de Toilette, STELLANUDE is available as a linen mist, allowing every woman to infuse the nude scent into her most intimate surroundings. From crisp sheets to silk slips, the mist gives any fabric the bare allure of lingerie. â€œI love the idea of walking through a scented mist in your lingerie,â€ Stella divulges. â€œItâ€™s quite a cheeky, intimate way to start the day, and itâ€™s refreshing not spraying a scent directly on your skin.â€
 
 
STELLANUDE is enclosed in a pretty pink slip case, echoing the seduction of delicate lingerie. When undressed, the vintage-inspired bottle reveals contrasting transparent and nude pink panels, implying the juxtaposition of concealed flesh against the bare skin.  
 Stella Nude comes in 1.0oz, 1.6oz, , 3.4oz, and as Linen Scented Mist 4.2oz.

short_description: Bakhoor Al Arais  by  Swiss Arabian  is a Oriental Woody fragrance for women and men.  Bakhoor Al Arais  was launched in 2012. Top notes are Vanilla and Spicy Notes; middle notes are Spicy Notes and Cedar; base notes are Palisander Rosewood and Amber.

perfume_name: Stella in Two Peony Stella McCartney
short_description: Stella in Two Peony  by  Stella McCartney  is a Floral fragrance for women.  Stella in Two Peony  was launched in 2006. The nose behind this fragrance is Jacques Cavallier Belletrud. Top notes are Peony and Rose; middle note is Pepper; base notes are Patchouli, Amber and Virginia Cedar.
Stella  by  Stella McCartney  is a Floral fragrance for women.  Stella  was launched in 2003. The nose behind this fragrance is Jacques Cavallier Belletrud.
long_description: Stella McCartney: â€œI showed an old-time picture of a rose to a designer. Just imagine a luxurious flower, heavy and beautiful; its petals fall off just by your gentle touch. I would love to keep this frail beauty, this moment of perfection in the perfume.â€ The designer of the perfume is the famous Jaques Cavallier. No matter the reputation of rose perfumes as old-fashioned, Stella, with her classical retro chic, stands apart from the batch of new perfumes and attracts attention with her peculiarity. In the top notes there are rose oil, peony and a gentle touch of fresh tangerine. In the heart of the perfume there is rose, whose gentle scent is emphasized by the deep note of amber in the base. The perfume was made in 2003.

perfume_name: KhÃ´l de BahreÃ¯n StÃ©phane Humbert Lucas 777
short_description: KhÃ´l de BahreÃ¯n  by  StÃ©phane Humbert Lucas 777  is a Oriental Woody fragrance for women and men.  KhÃ´l de BahreÃ¯n  was launched in 2013. The nose behind this fragrance is StÃ©phane Humbert Lucas. Top notes are Resins, Sweet Notes and Violet; middle notes are Iris, Ambergris and Sandalwood; base notes are Peru Balsam and Musk.

2022 Generation Femme  by  StÃ©phane Humbert Lucas 777  is a Floral Fruity Gourmand fragrance for women.  2022 Generation Femme  was launched in 2013. Top notes are Almond, Neroli and Nectarine; middle notes are Galbanum, Heliotrope and White Tea; base notes are Tonka Bean, Sandalwood and Jasmine.

perfume_name: Soleil de Jeddah StÃ©phane Humbert Lucas 777
short_description: Soleil de Jeddah  by  StÃ©phane Humbert Lucas 777  is a Leather fragrance for women and men.  Soleil de Jeddah  was launched in 2013. The nose behind this fragrance is StÃ©phane Humbert Lucas. Top notes are Chamomile, Osmanthus and Lemon; middle notes are Ambergris, Iris and Earthy Notes; base notes are Leather, Iris and Vanilla.
long_description: Soleil de Jeddeh by StÃ©phane Humbert Lucas 777 is a Leather fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Soleil de Jeddeh was launched in 2013. The nose behind this fragrance is Stephane Humbert Lucas. Top notes are osmanthus, chamomile and lemon; middle notes are iris and ambergris, with earthy notes; base notes are leather, vanilla and iris.

short_description: Mortal Skin  by  StÃ©phane Humbert Lucas 777  is a Oriental Woody fragrance for women and men.  Mortal Skin  was launched in 2015. The nose behind this fragrance is Stephane Humbert Lucas. Top notes are Ink, Blackberry, Incense and Labdanum; middle notes are Myrrh, Opoponax, Iris, Cardamom and Artemisia; base notes are Styrax, Ambergris, Atlas Cedar, Cedar, Sandalwood, Birch and Musk.
long_description:
Niche perfumer StÃ©phane Humbert Lucas launches his new fragrance Mortal Skin in 2015, the first fragrance of The Snake Collection, unlike the rest which belong to the 777 collection. The fragrance is smoky, oriental - woody.  
 
â€œ1st Act: The perfume, languid and colourful, hypnotises me,
I am facing two eyes that desire me.
Leafy coolness, fruits, the magic of the encounter,
The seduction begins. 
 2nd Act:
The perfume rises up and paralyses me,
The fangs ooze, wanting to sink into me.
Throbbing heat mixed with blue cold, I think I am bitten.
Sandalwood, tequila, intoxication. 
 3rd Act:
Bestiality, brutality, journey,
The perfume smells of hot ash.
Life slips away.
It now knows that all is beautiful. 
  Top notes: blackberry, ink, incense and labdanum. Heart: opoponax, iris, davana, myrrh and cardamom. Base: ambergris, styrax, sandalwood, labdanum, civet, cedar, birch and musk.  
  It is available as 50 ml EDP.

short_description: Ouverture  by  Sospiro Perfumes  is a Floral Fruity fragrance for women and men.  Ouverture  was launched in 2016. The nose behind this fragrance is Chris Maurice. Top notes are Magnolia, Orange and Fig Leaf; middle notes are Cinnamon, Ylang-Ylang, Bulgarian Rose and Indian Jasmine; base notes are Amber, Cashmere Wood, Vanilla, Incense and Sandalwood.

Rosso Afgano  by  Sospiro Perfumes  is a Oriental Floral fragrance for women and men.  Rosso Afgano  was launched in 2014. The nose behind this fragrance is Chris Maurice. Top notes are Rose and Saffron; middle notes are Patchouli and Cedar; base notes are Tobacco, Musk and Vanilla.

Black Gemstone  by  StÃ©phane Humbert Lucas 777  is a Oriental fragrance for women and men.  Black Gemstone  was launched in 2013. The nose behind this fragrance is StÃ©phane Humbert Lucas. Top notes are Cedar and Lemon; middle notes are Resins and Myrrh; base notes are Teak Wood, Olibanum and Tonka Bean.

Soprano  by  Sospiro Perfumes  is a Oriental Floral fragrance for women and men.  Soprano  was launched in 2018. Top notes are Fruits, Litchi, Freesia and Calabrian bergamot; middle notes are Bulgarian Rose, Milk, Osmanthus and Egyptian Jasmine; base notes are Agarwood (Oud), Leather and Patchouli.

Opera  by  Sospiro Perfumes  is a Oriental Floral fragrance for women and men.  Opera  was launched in 2014. The nose behind this fragrance is Chris Maurice. Top notes are Fruity Notes and Turkish Rose; middle notes are Nutmeg, Ylang-Ylang, Ambergris and Leather; base notes are Patchouli, Vanilla, Musk, Vetiver and Virginian Cedar.

Muse  by  Sospiro Perfumes  is a Oriental Floral fragrance for women and men.  Muse  was launched in 2018. Top notes are Plum, Leather and White Flowers; middle notes are Labdanum, Artemisia and Jasmine; base notes are Raspberry, Benzoin, Amber and Patchouli.

Laylati (Afgano Puro)  by  Sospiro Perfumes  is a Woody Aromatic fragrance for women and men.  Laylati (Afgano Puro)  was launched in 2011. Top note is Green Notes; middle notes are Virginia Cedar and Patchouli; base notes are Tobacco, Musk and Vanille.

Erba Pura  by  Sospiro Perfumes  is a Oriental fragrance for women and men.  Erba Pura  was launched in 2013. Erba Pura was created by Christian Carbonnel and Laura Santander. Top notes are Orange, Bergamot and Lemon; middle note is Fruits; base notes are White Musk, Amber and Madagascar Vanilla.

Ensemble  by  Sospiro Perfumes  is a Oriental fragrance for women and men.  Ensemble  was launched in 2017. The nose behind this fragrance is Chris Maurice. Top notes are Calabrian bergamot, Amalfi Lemon and Mandarin Orange; middle notes are Sandalwood, Tobacco and Pink Pepper; base notes are Tobacco, Mexican Vanilla and Musk.

Duetto  by  Sospiro Perfumes  is a Chypre Floral fragrance for women.  Duetto  was launched in 2011. The nose behind this fragrance is Chris Maurice. Top notes are Pink Pepper, Coriander and Ylang-Ylang; middle notes are Rose, Clove and Jasmine; base notes are Agarwood (Oud), Musk, Patchouli, Amber, Sandalwood, Vanille, oak moss and Vetiver.

Erba Gold  by  Sospiro Perfumes  is a Oriental fragrance for women and men.  Erba Gold  was launched in 2016. The nose behind this fragrance is Chris Maurice. Top notes are Sicilian Orange, Calabrian bergamot and Sicilian Lemon; middle note is Fruits; base notes are White Musk, Amber and Madagascar Vanilla.

Accento  by  Sospiro Perfumes  is a Oriental Woody fragrance for women and men.  Accento  was launched in 2011. Accento was created by Christian Carbonnel and Laura Santander. Top notes are Pineapple and Hyacinth; middle notes are Pink Pepper, Iris and Jasmine; base notes are Musk, Amber, Vetiver, Patchouli and Vanille.

Diapason  by  Sospiro Perfumes  is a Woody Floral Musk fragrance for women and men.  Diapason  was launched in 2017. The nose behind this fragrance is Chris Maurice. Top notes are Bulgarian Rose and Geranium; middle notes are Guaiac Wood and Atlas Cedar; base notes are Amber, Haitian Vetiver and Musk.

Afgano Puro  by  Sospiro Perfumes  is a fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance.  Afgano Puro  was launched in 2022. The nose behind this fragrance is Christian Provenzano. Top note is Herbal Notes; middle notes are Patchouli and Cedar; base notes are Musk, Tobacco and Vanilla.
long_description:
The intimate and smoky atmosphere of a club in the darkness of the night. A woody brew of Virginia Cedar and Patchouli stirred with a rhythmic blend of Green Notes forming swirls of smoke that invoke all your senses to embark on a nostalgic jazz odyssey. Laced with enigmatic base notes of sweet whipped vanilla and heady musk, with a sophisticated touch of Tobacco filling the room like the sweet sound of a saxophone and carrying the fragrance into a mysterious, dark, and intensely sensual energy. 
 Top Notes: Herbal Notes 
Heart Notes: Cedar, Patchouli 
Base Notes: Tabacco, Musk, Vanilla

short_description: Nur  by  SoOud  is a Oriental fragrance for women. The nose behind this fragrance is StÃ©phane Humbert Lucas.
long_description: Nur or 'Light "is a pearly - powdery scent of amber; precious, elegant and refined. It contains notes of lemon, incense, artemisia, chamomile, cedar, apricot, orris root, musk, amber, Russian leather and vanilla from Madagascar. It is available as Eau Fine (EDP).

short_description: Ouris  by  SoOud  is a Oriental Vanilla fragrance for women. The nose behind this fragrance is StÃ©phane Humbert Lucas.
long_description:
Ouris ("sublime") is a symphony of butterfly colors, which include notes of peach, plum and blackcurrant, sweet Turkish delight, jasmine, almond and pollen. This beautiful feminine palette contains additional notes of honey, tagetes, jasmine, white cedar, iris, sandalwood, vanilla and tonka.  
  It is available as Eau Fine (EDP)

short_description: Fam  by  SoOud  is a Woody Spicy fragrance for women and men.  Fam  was launched in 2010. The nose behind this fragrance is StÃ©phane Humbert Lucas.
long_description:
Fam (Mouth) is an intensive and flamboyant perfume of red spices combined with warm woody tones and powdery floral aromas. This sophisticated fragrance exudes all the charms of agar wood, with additional notes of saffron, chili, roses, cashmere, rose powder, rubber sap, vinyl accord, sandalwood, cedar, milk and red musk.  
  It is available as Eau Fine (EDP) and Nektar Parfum (perfume extract).

short_description: Jadab Eau Fine  by  SoOud  is a Oriental Floral fragrance for men.  Jadab Eau Fine  was launched in 2014. The nose behind this fragrance is StÃ©phane Humbert Lucas.

Ilham  by  SoOud  is a Oriental fragrance for women and men.  Ilham  was launched in 2014. Top notes are Caramel, Red Berries, Peach, Saffron and Leather; middle notes are Pink Pepper, Labdanum, Cypriol Oil or Nagarmotha, Woodsy Notes and Ginger; base notes are Vanilla, Agarwood (Oud), Benzoin, Patchouli, Musk and Peru Balsam.
long_description:
Ilham is the new fragrance by soOud: in Arabic it is the sound of the word whose corresponding meaning is â€œInspirationâ€. A complex and intense olfactory pyramid, notable for such precious and unusual ingredients as saffron, grey amber, tree musk, the Indian spice Nagarmotha or the Malaysian essential oil Gujum.  
 In soOud, the sensuality of oriental fragrances, profound, intriguing and passionate, typical of the Arab world, encounter a soul refined in its western manifacturing. Two precious raw materials conceal rare essences dedicated to the exploration of the senses, divided into two lines: Nektar, true high-concentration, rich, precious extracts, and Eau Fine, intense and delicate on the skin.  
 The names chosen are the phonetic translation of Arab words: on every package you can discover their meaning in English and French. Every fragrance extols inner beauty: the bottles almost entirely lacquered â€“ except for the central part where a strip of transparent glass appears â€“ to remind us of the niqab veil, which leaves a glimpse only of the eyes of the person who wears it. The stopper with its half cut recalls the sloping lines of modern buildings in the Middle East, completing a masterful blend of traditions and contemporaneity.
middle_notes: Pink Pepper,Labdanum,Cypriol Oil or Nagarmotha,Woodsy Notes,Ginger

short_description: Asmar  by  SoOud  is a Oriental Spicy fragrance for women and men.  Asmar  was launched in 2010. The nose behind this fragrance is StÃ©phane Humbert Lucas.
long_description:
Asmar is the dusty scentof earth and sun, tanned skin and sand. It is a scent of amber, strong yet delicate due to its warm notes. Notes: bergamot, white honey, roasted coffee, amber cigar, grape marc, amber, tobacco leaf, suede, musk and vanilla. Dorian Gray meets Scheherazade ...  
  It is available as Eau Fine (EDP) and Nektar Parfum (perfume extract).

short_description: Soir de Lune  by  Sisley  is a Chypre Floral fragrance for women.  Soir de Lune  was launched in 2006. The nose behind this fragrance is Dominique Ropion. Top notes are Coriander, Pepper Oil, Nutmeg, Bergamot, Lemon and Mandarin Orange; middle notes are May Rose, Mimosa, Iris, Jasmine, Lily-of-the-Valley and Peach; base notes are Honey, Oakmoss, Patchouli, Musk and Sandalwood.
long_description: Soir de Lune is a pefume for those who are chosen; itâ€™s elegant, intense, a modern fruity-chypre. The moon illuminates the sky, the night is mysterious and magnetic. Dominique Ropion used a sharp chypre essence for its main composition; a voloptous floral heart made of rose, mimosa, jasmine and lily-of-the-valley, while the trail is a more intense and richer thanks to the sweet and darker base. At its heart, a cool freshness of iris is opposed to a honey-sweet mimosa note. Main notes are: lemon, bergamot, orange, mandarine, coriander, nutmeg, pimento as top notes; the heart note is composed of May rose absolute, mimosa absolute, jasmine, lily-of-the-valley, peach and the base note includes moss, musk, patchouli, honey, sandalwood. A bottle both rounded and facetted, and topped with a metal cap designed by Polish sculptor Bronislaw Krzysztof. Soir de Lune is available in 30ml, 50ml and 100ml Eau de Parfum bottles. It was created in 2006.

short_description: Sisley Eau de 2  by  Sisley  is a Chypre Floral fragrance for women.  Sisley Eau de 2  was launched in 2009. Top notes are Bergamot, Basil and Cardamom; middle notes are Cyclamen, Iris, Jasmine and Rose; base notes are Virginia Cedar, Vetiver, Patchouli and Sandalwood.
long_description:
Three new fragrances by the house of Sisley have been presented. They are sparkling and simple in their elegance, just like a beautiful summer dress teased by breezes that move its pleats. The fragrances were created as three sisters or three faces of the same woman and they are marked with numbers â€“ 1, 2 and 3.
 
  Sisley Eau de 2 is created as fresh and clean. It starts with a green sonata of bergamot, basil and cardamom, adding aquatic iris, Egyptian jasmine, cyclamen and rose, whereas base notes comprise depth and a warm trail of a chypre-woody combination of patchouli, cedar, vetiver and sandalwood. 
 The flacons are made of glass, with a stopper characteristic of the Sisley brand. The stopper was designed by Polish sculptor Bronislaw Krzysztof. All three fragrances are available as 100ml (3, 4 oz) EDP and they arrive on the market in April 2009.

short_description: Soir d'Ðžrient  by  Sisley  is a Oriental fragrance for women.  Soir d'Ðžrient  was launched in 2015. The nose behind this fragrance is Olivier Pescheux. Top notes are Saffron, Iran Galbanum and Italian Lemon; middle notes are Turkish Rose, Black Pepper and Geranium; base notes are Incense, Patchouli and Sandalwood.

Sisley Eau de 3  by  Sisley  is a Citrus Aromatic fragrance for women.  Sisley Eau de 3  was launched in 2009. Top notes are Bergamot, Amalfi Lemon, Grapefruit and Mandarin Orange; middle notes are Ginger and Osmanthus; base notes are Patchouli, Vetiver, Benzoin, Vanilla and Musk.
long_description:
Three new fragrances by the house of Sisley have been presented. They are sparkling and simple in their elegance, just like a beautiful summer dress teased by breezes that move its pleats. The fragrances were created as three sisters or three faces of the same woman and they are marked with numbers â€“ 1, 2 and 3.
 
  Sisley Eau de 3 attracts mysteriously with its luminous and cheerful citruses, a mixture of bergamot, mandarin, grapefruit and lemon. A heart provokes with purple ginger, along with osmanthus, while a base encompasses elegant and classy notes of accentuated patchouli, vetiver, benzoin, vanilla and musk. 
 The flacons are made of glass, with a stopper characteristic of the Sisley brand. The stopper was designed by Polish sculptor Bronislaw Krzysztof. All three fragrances are available as 100ml (3, 4 oz) EDP and they arrive on the market in April 2009.

short_description: Izia  by  Sisley  is a Floral Aldehyde fragrance for women.  Izia  was launched in 2017. The nose behind this fragrance is Amandine Clerc-Marie. Top notes are White Bergamot, Aldehydes and Pink Pepper; middle notes are Rose, Angelica, Floral Notes, Peony, Lily-of-the-Valley and Jasmine; base notes are Musk, Cedar and Amber.
long_description: Sisley Izia is a "modern, new and multifunctional" perfume with a focus on the note of rose. The composition begins with aldehydes, white bergamot and pink pepper. A rose accord in the "sophisticated" heart of the perfume is enriched with transparent floral notes and angelica. Oriental, musk and cedar form the warm woody-musky base of the fragrance.The fragrance is available as a 30, 50 and 100 ml Eau de Parfum.

short_description: Sisley Eau de 1  by  Sisley  is a Aromatic Green fragrance for women.  Sisley Eau de 1  was launched in 2009. Top notes are Grapefruit, Pink Pepper, Spices and Mandarin Orange; middle notes are Juniper, Tea and Jasmine; base notes are Musk and Patchouli.
long_description:
Three new fragrances by the house of Sisley have been presented. They are sparkling and simple in their elegance, just like a beautiful summer dress teased by breezes that move its pleats. The fragrances were created as three sisters or three faces of the same woman and they are marked with numbers â€“ 1, 2 and 3.
 
 Sisley Eau de 1 stimulates and introduces liveliness in the very beginning of the fragrance, with notes of green mandarin, grapefruit, pink pepper and spices. A heart is created as floral, powerful, sunny and composed of aquatic jasmine, green tea and juniper berries, while base notes are characterized with chypre accords of patchouli and musk.
 
 The flacons are made of glass, with a stopper characteristic of the Sisley brand. The stopper was designed by Polish sculptor Bronislaw Krzysztof. All three fragrances are available as 100ml (3, 4 oz) EDP and they arrive on the market in April 2009.

short_description: Eau Tropicale  by  Sisley  is a Chypre Floral fragrance for women.  Eau Tropicale  was launched in 2014. The nose behind this fragrance is Domitille Michalon Bertier. Top notes are Passionfruit, Bergamot, Hibiscus, Frangipani and Ginger flower; middle notes are Violet, Turkish Rose and Tuberose; base notes are Ambrette (Musk Mallow), Patchouli and Cedar.
long_description:
Sisley launches its new fragrance Eau Tropicale in March of 2014. The fragrance is inspired by the atmosphere of a tropical forest after the storm and rain.
 
 
Eau Tropicale is a fresh floral - chypre scent that begins with exuberant notes of bergamot, exotic ginger flower, hibiscus, frangipani and passion fruit. The composition develops with a heart of fresh violet leaf, Turkish rose and tuberose. Its base blends cedar, patchouli and ambrette seed of musky character.  
 The bottle is transparent with purple colors. It is decorated with a cap which was designed by Polish artist Bronislaw Krzysztof. Artist Christina Radzvill is credited for the illustrations on the box and the bottle.  
 The fragrance is available as 100 ml Eau de Toilette.

short_description: MÃ©moire d'Anna  by  Simimi  is a Floral Fruity fragrance for women.  MÃ©moire d'Anna  was launched in 2016. The nose behind this fragrance is Paolo Terenzi. Top notes are Melon, Green Apple, Pineapple and Violet Leaf; middle notes are Watery Notes, Lily-of-the-Valley, Tuberose, Peach, Carnation and Jasmine; base notes are Musk, Sandalwood and Vanilla.
long_description:
â€œThe story of Anna Jarvis, a loving daughter who payed tribute to her motherâ€™s desire by establishing the Motherâ€™s Day in 1907 in West Virginia. She worked hard to bestow honour on all mothers and pay tribute to their contributions. 
 Sweet dream of melon, pineapple and green apple, main fruit in West Virginia. Floral heart recalling the traditional Motherâ€™s Day gift, with special mention of Carnations, Annaâ€™s mother favourite flower. The down dry is particularly smooth and warm, like the arms of a mother.â€ â€” press release of the brand.

short_description: RÃªve de Sisa  by  Simimi  is a Floral fragrance for women.  RÃªve de Sisa  was launched in 2016. The nose behind this fragrance is Paolo Terenzi. Top notes are Toffee, Sweet Notes, Pineapple, Galbanum and Orange Blossom; middle notes are Heliotrope, Jasmine and Rose; base notes are Toffee, Vanilla, Tonka Bean, Sandalwood and Musk.
long_description:
The inspiration for this sweet floral fragrance is the story of the recently awarded Sisa Abu Daooh. At the age of 65, the Egyptâ€™s president Abdel Fatah al-Sisi gave her the Motherhood award of 2015. And she truly deserve it; she became a man to be able to raise her own daughter. 
 RÃªve de Sisa has the same personal and strong character as this brave woman, combined with the gentle touch of a devoted mother. It is possible thanks to the blend of roses, jasmine and sandal wood, combined with pineapple, candyfloss and toffee. The sweet and spicy tonka beans accentuate the powdery and vanilla impressions which reflects the exotic Egypt and its dunes, as
well as the powder of the bricks Sisa used to build. Vanilla and heliotrope make us think about motherâ€™s milk or even Cleopatra and her milk-baths. 
RÃªve de Sisa by Simimi is a Floral fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. RÃªve de Sisa was launched in 2016. Top notes are toffee, sweet notes, pineapple, galbanum and orange blossom; middle notes are jasmine, rose and heliotrope; base notes are vanilla, tonka bean, musk, toffee and sandalwood.

short_description: Eau du Soir  by  Sisley  is a Chypre Floral fragrance for women.  Eau du Soir  was launched in 1990. Eau du Soir was created by Jeannine Mongin, Hubert d'Ornano and Isabelle d'Ornano. Top notes are Grapefruit and Mandarin Orange; middle notes are oak moss, Juniper, Patchouli, Pepper, Iris, Carnation, Syringa, Rose, French labdanum, Jasmine, Lily-of-the-Valley and Ylang-Ylang; base notes are Musk and Amber.
long_description:
Eau du Soir is the second perfume by the house of Sisley and it is feminine, elegant and eternal. Its complex and rich composition is based on perfect harmony of contrasted lines: fresh citrus, sensual flowers, warm amber and musk. The bottle, with its golden stopper (made of 18 karat gold), was designed by Polish sculptor BronisÅ‚aw Krzysztof.
The top notes are mandarin orange, grapefruit, spruce and carnation. The heart consists of seringo, jasmine, rose and lily-of-the-valley. Musk, amber and patchouli are in the base.
Countess Isabelle dâ€™Ornano was given Eau de Soir as a gift by her husband, count Hubert d'Ornano in 1990. The count created a unique floral composition in the centre of which was Spanish flower seringa. Its fragrance, as in the case of many other types of white flowers, radiates an intense scent through night air and attracts night butterflies to pollinate it. The perfume was created to remind countess of her childhood in Spain. The name was chosen because of night flower seringe (in French, soir means evening). For several years Eau de Soir was countess' personal perfume and it was no sooner than 1999, after her friend persuaded her, that it was released for public.

short_description: Blanc de Zhang  by  Simimi  is a Oriental Floral fragrance for women.  Blanc de Zhang  was launched in 2016. The nose behind this fragrance is Paolo Terenzi. Top notes are Coconut and Plum; middle notes are Magnolia, Jasmine, Lily-of-the-Valley and Bulgarian Rose; base notes are Vanilla Flower, Almond, Tonka Bean and White Musk.
long_description:
This floral oriental fragrance is inspired by an exemplary female figure in the Chinese culture,
Zhang. She was the mother of Mencius, the most famous philosopher after Confucius. She raised her son all alone after becoming widow when Mencius was still a child. She did so great that she turned into a model of maternity in China for the devotion she showed to her sonâ€™s welfare. 
Blanc de Zhang by Simimi is a Oriental Floral fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Blanc de Zhang was launched in 2016. Top notes are coconut and plum; middle notes are jasmine, bulgarian rose, lily-of-the-valley and magnolia; base notes are white musk, vanilla flower, almond and tonka bean.

short_description: GrÃ¢ce de Klavdia  by  Simimi  is a Woody Aromatic fragrance for women.  GrÃ¢ce de Klavdia  was launched in 2016. The nose behind this fragrance is Paolo Terenzi. Top notes are Lavender, Bergamot, Neroli and Lime; middle notes are Cedar, Carnation, Bay essence, Pink Pepper, Mace, Tobacco and Saffron; base notes are Patchouli, Musk, Ambergris and Vanilla.
long_description:
The inspiration for this aromatic dry woods fragrance is the story of a beautiful love triangle.
Normally, this expression has negative connotations of lies and infidelity. But in this case, between the Russian Klavdia Novikova, the Japanese Yasaburo Hachiya and his wife Hisako, it only means love and sacrifice. 
 GrÃ¢ce de Klavdia has a fresh agrestic top of lavender, bergamot and neroli, inspired on the
rural Progress town (Amur) where Klavdia and Yasaburo shared their unconditional love. The
contrast is given by the balmy and woody heart of Klavdia and her relationship with the Japanese culture; a warm hug of grey amber, sandal, cedar and patchouli. The base notes are a tribute to that man who sincerely loved two women because of the destinyâ€™s desire. The precious masculine character is emphasized by spicy and tobacco: mace, bay, pink pepper and saffron. 
GrÃ¢ce de Klavdia by Simimi is a Woody Aromatic fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. GrÃ¢ce de Klavdia was launched in 2016. Top notes are lime, lavender, bergamot and neroli; middle notes are tobacco, carnation, mace, bay essence, cedar, pink pepper and saffron; base notes are musk, patchouli, ambergris and vanilla.

short_description: Esprit de Candela  by  Simimi  is a Oriental Woody fragrance for women.  Esprit de Candela  was launched in 2016. The nose behind this fragrance is Paolo Terenzi. Top notes are Cloves, Saffron, Coriander and Bergamot; middle notes are Amber, Leather and Damask Rose; base notes are Peru Balsam, Labdanum, Sandalwood, Vanilla, Guaiac Wood, Tonka Bean, Patchouli, Virginia Cedar and Musk.
long_description:
This oriental wood fragrance is the translation of the ballet and orchestra El Amor Brujo into the music of smells. The work of Manuel Falla has a distinctively Andalusian character. The music contains moments of remarkable beauty and originality, and the players relate a story of passion and love without limits. 
 Esprit de Candela means passionate love, the fight of lovers to be together. Two different souls,
Candela and Carmelo, are embodied in a sweet redeeming kiss kept in a precious perfume bottle. The Andalusian flamenco has an oriental flavor achieved by amber heart, damask rose and leather. Complex, since it requests time to understand a creation like this, but gentle on your skin thanks to the power of musk and the spicy bouquet on the top notes, balanced through the agruma. 
Esprit de Candela by Simimi is a Oriental Woody fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Esprit de Candela was launched in 2016. Top notes are bergamot, coriander, saffron and cloves; middle notes are damask rose, amber and leather; base notes are patchouli, sandalwood, guaiac wood, virginia cedar, peru balsam, labdanum, vanilla, tonka bean and musk.

short_description: Blanc de Sisa  by  Simimi  is a Floral fragrance for women.  Blanc de Sisa  was launched in 2016. The nose behind this fragrance is Paolo Terenzi. Top notes are Brown sugar, Papaya and Mango; middle notes are Vanilla, Almond, Passionfruit and Magnolia; base notes are Vanilla, Musk, Sandalwood and Amber.
long_description:
The inspiration for this sweet floral fragrance is the story of the recently awarded Sisa Abu Daooh. At the age of 65, the Egyptâ€™s president Abdel Fatah al-Sisi gave her the Motherhood award of 2015. And she truly deserve it; she became a man to be able to raise her own daughter. 
 Blanc de Sisa by Simimi is a Floral fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Blanc de Sisa was launched in 2016. Top notes are brown sugar, mango and papaya; middle notes are passionfruit, vanilla, almond and magnolia; base notes are vanilla, sandalwood, musk and amber.

short_description: Espoir de Zhang  by  Simimi  is a Oriental Floral fragrance for women.  Espoir de Zhang  was launched in 2016. The nose behind this fragrance is Paolo Terenzi. Top notes are Coconut, Anise and Plum; middle notes are Tuberose, Jasmine, Lily-of-the-Valley and Wild Rose; base notes are Almond, Vanilla, Tonka Bean and White Musk.
long_description:
This floral oriental fragrance is inspired by an exemplary female figure in the Chinese culture,
Zhang. She was the mother of Mencius, the most famous philosopher after Confucius. She raised her son all alone after becoming widow when Mencius was still a child. She did so great that she turned into a model of maternity in China for the devotion she showed to her sonâ€™s welfare. 
 Espoir de Zhang is the result of melting the Oriental culture and flavors. From its flowers like
jasmine and vanilla, to its animals through musk; all of them belonging to the Oriental family of scents. The bouquet opens very sweet, like the smiles of the scholars, thanks to the combination of coconut powdered and plum. After few seconds the fragrance of precious flowers envelops you like a soft motherâ€™s mantle, but immediately the mix of Tahiti vanilla and white musk give us a fresh breeze of Zhangâ€™s soul. 
 Espoir de Zhang by Simimi is a Oriental Floral fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Espoir de Zhang was launched in 2016. Top notes are coconut, plum and anise; middle notes are jasmine, wild rose, lily-of-the-valley and tuberose; base notes are white musk, vanilla, almond and tonka bean.

short_description: Zen  by  Shiseido  is a Floral Woody Musk fragrance for women.  Zen  was launched in 2007. The nose behind this fragrance is Michel Almairac. Top notes are Grapefruit, Pineapple, Bergamot, Orange and Rose; middle notes are Freesia, Red Apple, Lotus, Hyacinth, Gardenia, Lily-of-the-Valley, Violet and Orris; base notes are Patchouli, Cedar, Musk, Amber, Incense and Pine.
long_description:
After the two Zen versions, Zen is reborn in 2007 . This vibrant floral, with wood and spices, was designed by Michel Almairac. An opening of a zesty grapefruit note, sweet bergamot, orange, pineapple wrapped in blue rose. The heart features a generous floral bouquet made of freesia, gardenia, violet, lily-of-the-valley, Chinese rose, red apple and lotus blossom. The warm and sensual trail blends patchouli, cedar wood, musk and white musk, amber and frankincense.
The bottle is designed by Taisuke Kikuchi. Zen is available in 30ml, 50 ml and 100ml EDT bottles.

short_description: Blanc d'Anna  by  Simimi  is a Floral Fruity fragrance for women.  Blanc d'Anna  was launched in 2016. The nose behind this fragrance is Paolo Terenzi. Top notes are Green Apple, Herbal Notes, Cassis and Fig Leaf; middle notes are Lily-of-the-Valley, Plum, Jasmine, Cyclamen and Rose; base notes are Musk, Palisander Rosewood, Oak, Cedar, ebony tree and Amber.
long_description:
This fresh fruity-floral fragrance is inspired by the Motherâ€™s Day and its origins.
Blanc d`Anna by Simimi is a Floral Fruity fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. Blanc d`Anna was launched in 2016. Top notes are cassis, herbal notes, fig leaf and green apple; middle notes are rose, plum, jasmine, cyclamen and lily-of-the-valley; base notes are cedar, ebony tree, oak, palisander rosewood, amber and musk.

short_description: Old Spice Original  by  Shulton Company  is a Oriental Spicy fragrance for men.  Old Spice Original  was launched in 1938. The nose behind this fragrance is Albert Hauck. Top notes are Nutmeg, Star Anise, Aldehydes, Orange and Lemon; middle notes are Cinnamon, Carnation, Geranium, Pimento, Heliotrope and Jasmine; base notes are Benzoin, Vanilla, Musk, Tonka Bean, Cedar and Ambergris.
Salt Caramel  by  Shay & Blue London  is a Oriental Vanilla fragrance for women and men.  Salt Caramel  was launched in 2014. The nose behind this fragrance is Julie MassÃ©.
Fawakeh  by  Shirley May  is a Oriental fragrance for women and men.

S Kiss  by  Shakira  is a Floral Fruity fragrance for women.  S Kiss  was launched in 2017. Top notes are Black Currant and Lemon; middle notes are Pink Peony and Honeysuckle; base notes are Musk and Sandalwood.
Oud Alif  by  Shay & Blue London  is a Oriental Vanilla fragrance for women and men.  Oud Alif  was launched in 2013. The nose behind this fragrance is Julie MassÃ©.

perfume_name: Opulent Shaik Gold Edition for Men Shaik
short_description: Opulent Shaik Gold Edition for Men  by  Shaik  is a Oriental fragrance for men.  Opulent Shaik Gold Edition for Men  was launched in 2013. Top notes are Pink Pepper, Saffron and Black Pepper; middle notes are Rose, Lavender and Geranium; base notes are Agarwood (Oud), Ambergris, Sandalwood and Tonka Bean.

Opulent Shaik Classic No 33  by  Shaik  is a Oriental Floral fragrance for women.  Opulent Shaik Classic No 33  was launched in 2007. Top notes are Angelica, Coriander and Bergamot; middle notes are Heliotrope, Iris, Peony and Rose; base notes are Vanilla, Tonka Bean, Musk and Sandalwood.
long_description:
Shaik is a mysterious prince of the desert, gorgeous and powerful, invisible and ever-present he gives riches with his generous hand and blessed are those who meet him... Shaik is a selective fragrance line born in Arabia, in fairy-taley Bahrain, created without much restriction in components, as a fairytale does not know limitations, as well as its founder Mohammed Al Asfoor in his desire to present it to us.  
 
 The bottle of the women\'s fragrance (40ml (1.39 fl.oz.)) is designed in a shape of traditional short double bladed dagger called khunja, and is reminiscent of seductive curves of a woman\'s body...  
 
The composition is created of spices as well, with woodsy, musk, and wild flowers notes, only softer and feminine. 
 
 See Which Look is the Tenderest in the World?

short_description: Opulent Shaik Classic No 77  by  Shaik  is a Oriental fragrance for men. Top notes are Lavender, Bergamot, Lemon and Basil; middle notes are Apple, Cinnamon, Cloves and Geranium; base notes are Vanilla, Musk, Patchouli, Oakmoss, Labdanum and Cedar.

Chic Shaik No 70  by  Shaik  is a Woody Aromatic fragrance for men.  Chic Shaik No 70  was launched in 2008. Top notes are Bergamot, Clary Sage, Orange and Lemon; middle notes are Jasmine and Lily-of-the-Valley; base notes are Cedar, Musk, Vetiver, Sandalwood and Patchouli.

Chic Shaik No 30  by  Shaik  is a Floral Woody Musk fragrance for women.  Chic Shaik No 30  was launched in 2008. Top notes are Passionfruit, Cardamom and Bergamot; middle notes are Passionfruit, Patchouli, Rose and Jasmine; base notes are Patchouli, Tonka Bean, Vanilla and Ambergris.
long_description: Chic Shaik is the second perfume line by Shaik, launched in 2008. Chic Shaik No 30 is more lighter fragrance then the previous one from the Opulent Blue collection. It includes aromatic, floral and woody notes.

short_description: Precious Pink  by  Sergio Tacchini  is a Floral Woody Musk fragrance for women.  Precious Pink  was launched in 2009. Top notes are Amalfi Lemon, Granny Smith apple and Lily-of-the-Valley; middle notes are Tea, Peach and Jasmine; base notes are Virginia Cedar, Musk and Amber.
long_description:
Charming Precious Pink is a new fragrance by the house of Sergio Tacchini presented in September 2009, aiming at dynamic and elegant woman with good taste, who chooses sensual, natural, classic and elegant aromas. She moves in gentle way and wants to seduce gently, as well.
 
 The beautiful and invigorating new fragrance of this house represents its new, charming face. Pink is chosen as colour of femininity implying freshness, airiness, positive view of things and Italian-style comfort.
 
 Composition of Precious Pink begins with green-floral notes. Lemon, lily of the valley and green apple refresh and give a classic feminine start. A heart introduces green tea and floral aromas of jasmine, enriched with peach zest. A base of this perfume incorporates amber, musk and cedar.
 
 Design of the flacon reflects theme of the composition. This romantic, elegant and pink flacon reflects a game of aromas, airiness, light and reflections with its nuances. Neck of the bottle features a silver detail which reminds of modern fashion details.
 
 Photos for advertising campaign were taken by famous Parisian, Herve Haddad. The young, charming and modern girl in the advertisement was photographed in Monte Carlo bay. Advertising poster features a flacon on the new perfume, as well. Sergio Tacchini Precious Pink is available as 30, 50 and 100ml edt along with an accompanying perfumed body care program: 400 ml shower gel and 250 ml body lotion.

short_description: Sergio Tacchini Donna  by  Sergio Tacchini  is a Floral Green fragrance for women.  Sergio Tacchini Donna  was launched in 1988. Top notes are Water Lily, Lotus, Bergamot and Pineapple; middle notes are Lily-of-the-Valley and Jasmine; base notes are Musk, Sandalwood, Vanilla and Amber.

O-Zone Woman  by  Sergio Tacchini  is a Floral Green fragrance for women.  O-Zone Woman  was launched in 2000. Top notes are Lemon, Bergamot and Orange; middle notes are Chamomile, Lavender, Lily-of-the-Valley, Jasmine and Rose; base notes are Green Tea and Cedar.

O-Zone Pink Wave  by  Sergio Tacchini  is a Floral fragrance for women.  O-Zone Pink Wave  was launched in 2011. Top notes are Apple Blossom, Cherry Blossom and Amalfi Lemon; middle notes are Rose and Jasmine; base notes are Tea, Virginia Cedar and Vanille.
long_description:
Sergio Tacchini unveiled two new limited edition fragrances for the spring of 2011, made of soft notes of greens and flowery gardens. Following the originals from 2000, O-Zone Woman and O-Zone Man, two new editions are presented: O-Zone Pink Wave and O-Zone Green Wave. 
 
 O-Zone Pink Wave is a light, delicate and airy scent, inspired by the drops of dew on the blooming spring nature. It contains notes of lemon, rose, cherry and apple blossoms, green tea, cedar and vanilla. 
  Available as 30 ml EDT.

short_description: Fantasy Forever  by  Sergio Tacchini  is a Oriental Floral fragrance for women.  Fantasy Forever  was launched in 2014. Top notes are Blueberry, Wild Rose and Bergamot; middle notes are Sandalwood, Jasmine and White Cedar Extract; base notes are Vanilla, Moss and Musk.
long_description:
Sergio Tacchini launches a new feminine fragrance in Summer 2014, named Fantasy Forever. Fantasy Forever is announced as a dazzling, intriguing and joyful fragrance full of charm. It represents the essence of the realization of romantic dreams.
 
 
The composition is light oriental-floral-fruity-woody. Sparkling bergamot, a subtle touch of blueberries and wild rose open the composition to the heart of jasmine, sandalwood and white cedar. Its powdery base consists of notes of musk, crystal moss and vanilla.
 
 
 The fragrance is available as 30, 50 and 100 ml Eau de Toilette.
