short_description: Experience Discovery  by  Sergio Tacchini  is a Woody Aromatic fragrance for men.  Experience Discovery  was launched in 2009. Top notes are Citruses and Green Notes; middle notes are Juniper, Eucalyptus and Thyme; base notes are Amber and Woodsy Notes.
long_description:
Sergio Tacchini presents Experience collection inspired by journeys and nature exploration, which connects sport and adventurist spirit. Fragrant pair Discovery and Sailing accepts challenge and creates a fragrant adventure which takes you up with dynamic compositions. Fragrant collection Experience was introduced in 2009.
 
 Experience Discovery is a passionate, olfactive passenger, which accentuates a strong bond between nature and unexplored wilderness. It was envisaged to presented different cultures and aromas when compared with our everyday life. This fragrance stands for our strength and independence in ourselves. It was created of citrusy-woody aromas with accentuated amber accords.
 
 Top notes incorporate citruses mixed with exotic herbs which introduce a fresh and dynamic opening. An aromatic wave of juniper berries, thyme and eucalyptus open new horizons in a heart of the fragrance, while a base is composed of exotic wood mixed with warm notes of amber adding character, charisma and dynamics to the perfume. Fragrance Experience Discovery is available in a flacon coloured like desert sun, in amount of 100 ml (3.4 oz) EDT, with an accompanying program which includes 400 ml bath and 75 ml solid deodorant.

short_description: Donna Blooming Flowers  by  Sergio Tacchini  is a Floral fragrance for women.  Donna Blooming Flowers  was launched in 2011. Top notes are Peony and Lily-of-the-Valley; middle notes are Iris and Jasmine; base notes are Lilac and Gardenia.
long_description:
Sergio Tacchini is launching a new fragrance for women, named Blooming Flowers.
 
 Sergio Tacchini Blooming Flowers is a feminine edition aiming at young girls who can't wait into the world of adulthood. The fragrance introduces a romantic composition that flirts with delicate and carefully selected floral accords. It seduces with lily of the valley, lilac, gardenia, iris, jasmine and peony. The fragrance is composed of essences of spring, high emotions, dash and happiness.  
 The fragrance can be purchased as 30 ml EDT, in a flacon decorated with tiny purple flowers. Its outer carton is also purple and sprinkled with flowers. Advertising campaign reveals more than it hides.

short_description: Club  by  Sergio Tacchini  is a Aromatic Fougere fragrance for men.  Club  was launched in 2012. The nose behind this fragrance is Symrise. Top notes are Citruses, Yuzu and Bergamot; middle notes are Water Notes, Lavender and Pineapple; base notes are Musk, Driftwood and Oakmoss.
long_description:
The new fragrance by Sergio Tacchini bears the name Club and is intended for casual yet elegant men who prefer the Italian style. It is also refreshing, subtle and warm, belonging to the family of modern fougere perfumes.
 
 
Sparkling citrus fruits of bergamot, yuzu and chinotto lead the composition to the heart of pineapple leaf, wild lavender and aquatic accords. Its woody - musky base leaves an intensive trail of crystalline moss, musk and driftwood. The fragrance is developed by Symrise perfumers. 
 
Sergio Tacchini Club is available as 30, 50 and 100 ml Eau de Toilette, 100 ml after shave lotion, 150 ml deodorant and 400 ml shower gel.

short_description: BE-ST  by  Sergio Tacchini  is a Floral fragrance for women.  BE-ST  was launched in 2008. Top notes are Black Currant, Bergamot and Green Apple; middle notes are Lilac, Peony, Pink Pepper and Jasmine; base notes are Musk and Vetiver.
long_description: BE-ST is a female Sergio Tacchini fragrance, launched in spring 2008, created to emphasize elegancy and womanâ€™s personality. Caressing with floral waves and a creamy ending, it is aimed at girls between the age of 20 and 30. The composition opens with notes of Calabria bergamot with black currant accords and green apple. Waves of sambaca jasmine, white lilac and peony, spiced with pink pepper, rule the heart. Base notes include creamy musk accompanied by vetiver and Balsa wood. The bottle is colored in violet tones, minimalistic and elegant, very modern. The fragrance is available as 30, 50 and 100 ml EDT, along with 100 ml deodorant.

short_description: Santal Majuscule  by  Serge Lutens  is a Oriental Woody fragrance for women and men.  Santal Majuscule  was launched in 2012.
Nuit de Cellophane  by  Serge Lutens  is a Floral fragrance for women and men.  Nuit de Cellophane  was launched in 2009.
long_description: Nuit de Cellophane, a perfume introduced in 2009, includes aromas of mandarin Chinese osmanthus and jasmine. This fragrance for women is available as 50 ml (1.7 oz) EDP and it is presented to the market in March 2009.

perfume_name: Sa Majeste la Rose Serge Lutens
short_description: Sa Majeste la Rose  by  Serge Lutens  is a Floral Green fragrance for women and men.  Sa Majeste la Rose  was launched in 2000. The nose behind this fragrance is Christopher Sheldrake.
long_description: A beautiful, intensive, floral bouquet with rose in the center. Her Highness, the Rose, is combined with fresh, green, opening notes, spices and woody notes in the base. The perfume was created by Christopher Sheldrake in 2000.

short_description: La Dompteuse EncagÃ©e  by  Serge Lutens  is a Floral fragrance for women and men.  La Dompteuse EncagÃ©e  was launched in 2021.
long_description:
La Dompteuse EncagÃ©e is a perfume made in France that fallsÂ in the Floral family, offering fragrance notes of a Frangipani Blossom Accord, Almond Notes, and Ylang-ylang. 
 "From this cold girl disguised in white, I can assume everything. However, from this feared snow, IÂ canÂ feel anÂ avalanche coming. The whiteness of the flower doesn't sayÂ anything of the freshness of the flower, the scent of frangipane takes care of this. Subtly almondy, to taste directly from the skin." -Serge Lutens Description.

short_description: Serge Noire  by  Serge Lutens  is a Oriental fragrance for women and men.  Serge Noire  was launched in 2008. Serge Noire was created by Serge Lutens and Christopher Sheldrake.
La Religieuse  by  Serge Lutens  is a Oriental Floral fragrance for women and men.  La Religieuse  was launched in 2015. The nose behind this fragrance is Christopher Sheldrake.
long_description:
The new fragrance of the Serge Lutens collection named LA RELIGIEUSE will be available at Palais Royal on January 30, 2015. The theme of the new edition is deep, philosophical and religious, and its composition was constructed as a fight of good and evil, a contrast of black and white. 
 The composition highlights jasmine, which is as pure and white as snow in this case and represents the bright side of the fragrance, while Lutensâ€™ religion is black, mysterious and dark, enveloped in aromas of civet, musk and incense. 
 Before this edition Lutens presented two fragrances with perfumer Christopher Sheldrake, in which jasmine played the main role. Those are Sarrasins from 2007 and A la Nuit from 2000. The new fragrance LA RELIGIEUSE will be available in a square-shaped glass flacon, while the fluid of the fragrance is colored in dark purple.

perfume_name: La Couche du Diable Serge Lutens
short_description: La Couche du Diable  by  Serge Lutens  is a Oriental Woody fragrance for women and men.  La Couche du Diable  was launched in 2019. The nose behind this fragrance is Christopher Sheldrake.
long_description: "How can one attend the coronation of Satan without ever once having tasted sin? Oud and labdanum come together to create a diabolical and sumptuous veil of indulgence and remorse for a first transgression."

short_description: Lâ€™Eau Serge Lutens  by  Serge Lutens  is a Floral Aldehyde fragrance for women and men.  Lâ€™Eau Serge Lutens  was launched in 2009. Lâ€™Eau Serge Lutens was created by Serge Lutens and Christopher Sheldrake.
long_description:
Serge Lutens wanted to create the â€œanti-perfumeâ€ with the clean notes of fresh and clear scent rather than a perfume in the classic sense. This fragrance is his response to the over production of perfumes and artificial scents. The fragrance is fresh as a mountain air and breeze, creating a feeling of just taking a bath and slipping into clean clothes.  
  Notes: aldehydes, citrus, magnolia, white mint, clary sage, ozonic notes and musk.  
  It is available as 100 ml EDT.

short_description: L'orpheline  by  Serge Lutens  is a fragrance for women and men.  L'orpheline  was launched in 2014.
long_description:
1. Yet another girl! 
Yes, if you believe that she is the abandoned part of me. Child, I have cut the world in two. On the one hand, a girl, The Vanquished â€“ not the loser! - and more precisely, that which germinated in her and which in myself, I raised; and on the other, a boy, The Victor. For a child, the world comes down to three people: himself, his mother and his father. Without everyone making such a clear-cut choice as mine, each one will be dependent on it throughout his life. 
 
 2. Did your choice present itself as the mother? 
Not the mother, her wound; I bore it. It is undeniably an identification. As for each and every one of us, I owe my life to chance. The famous throw of the dice appears exemplary to me â€“ it is a sacred number â€“ it is the one which leads us there where we should have been born or not to have been. I shall not recall the significant episodes of my destiny but, between what was and what I felt, the difference was greater. However, the child is the clairvoyant: he foresees. Since I accorded all the qualities of the feminine to the wound, she named me. 
 
 3. From now on, should we understand that the masculine was denied in you? 
From what to my eyes was officially required: the army, authority, power, order, moralism, yes. I was at war with the Male: Maleficence. It can be expected that from this moment, I invent a woman and bring us up to date, it is the baptism of blood. 
 
 4. Coming back to the orphan girl. Is this you? 
No, originally it was a virgin territory, it attracted me but I didnâ€™t recognise myself there; this territory which I denied was that of men. My mother, she was the wrath and I, her son, its revenge. 
 
 5. And the father, where is he? 
The father is the declared enemy. I was hatred on Earth, on Father. Of the mother I was the figurehead, and of the father the assassin. The wound did not heal. I could blind myself but I could see: the father was immortal. From him I keep the feminine which he betrayed. 
 
 6. How did you recover the road to perfume in this labyrinth? 
It is the memory, forgiveness and like this, what we have today, it was able to survive: From the dust. It is not only in the feminine but it also has no plural. It is the wake of my life, that which remains when all has disappeared. It is the invisible which, veil after veil, there where it is forgotten, fades into grey. 
 
 â€”Serge Lutens

short_description: Jeux de Peau  by  Serge Lutens  is a Oriental Woody fragrance for women and men.  Jeux de Peau  was launched in 2011. Top notes are Wheat and Milk; middle notes are Licorice, Coconut and Immortelle; base notes are Sandalwood, Apricot, Spices, Woody Notes, Osmanthus and Amber.
Cedre  by  Serge Lutens  is a Oriental Woody fragrance for women and men.  Cedre  was launched in 2005. The nose behind this fragrance is Christopher Sheldrake.
long_description: Elegant, warm and deep cedar scent is in centre of attention, which is shown by the name â€˜Cederâ€™. Highly esteemed cedar is combined with sensual and gentle tuberose, warm, spicy note of cinnamon, musk and amber. This elegant fragrance is appropriate for women and men. The perfume was launched in 2005 and its designer is Christopher Sheldrake.

short_description: Chergui  by  Serge Lutens  is a Oriental Spicy fragrance for women and men.  Chergui  was launched in 2001. The nose behind this fragrance is Christopher Sheldrake.
Datura Noir  by  Serge Lutens  is a Oriental Vanilla fragrance for women and men.  Datura Noir  was launched in 2001. The nose behind this fragrance is Christopher Sheldrake.
Fille en Aiguilles  by  Serge Lutens  is a Oriental Woody fragrance for women and men.  Fille en Aiguilles  was launched in 2009. The nose behind this fragrance is Christopher Sheldrake.
long_description: Fille en Aiguilles is an intensive, warm and aromatic new fragrance by Serge Lutens, who combines pine needles, incense and bay leaf, with accentuated fruity and spicy notes. Inspiration for this composition was scent and sound of pine forest in summer sun. The composition incorporates pine needles, vetiver, bay leaf, spices, fruit and incense. This perfume is available in amount of 50 ml.

short_description: Chypre Rouge  by  Serge Lutens  is a Chypre Fruity fragrance for women and men.  Chypre Rouge  was launched in 2006. The nose behind this fragrance is Christopher Sheldrake. Top notes are Caraway and Pine Tree Needles; middle notes are Honey, Beeswax and Jasmine; base notes are Oakmoss, Amber, Vanilla, Patchouli and Musk.
long_description: This is a very sensual fragrance with sweet honey notes, amber notes and oakmoss. According to SL, this is a scent of west France, a scent of a fairy tale forest. A part of 'Chypre' is represented by oakmoss with its woody deep smell and a heavy earth note. Top notes are thyme and pine tree needles; middle notes are honey, bees wax, jasmine and fruity resins; base notes are patchouli, moss, amber, musk and vanilla. The perfume was created by Christopher Sheldrake in 2006.

short_description: Unforgivable Black  by  Sean John  is a Woody Aromatic fragrance for men.  Unforgivable Black  was launched in 2008. Top notes are Green Mandarin, Grapefruit, Tangerine, Sicilian Lemon, Bergamot, Pear, Cardamom and Lavender; middle notes are Iris, Basil, Clary Sage and Rosemary; base notes are Coconut Rum, Cashmere Wood, Amber, Australian Sandalwood and Tonka Bean.
Ambre Sultan  by  Serge Lutens  is a fragrance for women and men.  Ambre Sultan  was launched in 1993. The nose behind this fragrance is Christopher Sheldrake.
Arabie  by  Serge Lutens  is a Oriental Woody fragrance for women and men.  Arabie  was launched in 2000. The nose behind this fragrance is Christopher Sheldrake.
long_description: Many of the Serge Lutens fragrances were inspired by journeys around Middle East. Arabie was inspired by eastern spice shops; it is an exquisitely warm spicy fragrance, dense and sweet from aromatic resins, temperamental, sunny, yet mysterious like East itself. Precious notes of cedar and sandal blend in with sweet notes of candied mandarin, dried fig and date. Nutmeg, cumin and clove at the heart pervade the composition with hot spicy notes. Aromatic bay-leaf, harsh and pleasant, joins the spices, dwelling in dense resin waves of Tonka, Siamese benzoina and myrrh. The final accord of labdanum joins aromatic opulence into a harmonic wholeness.
top_notes: Dried Fruits,Cloves,Dates,Nutmeg,Caraway,Bay Leaf,Resin,Siam Benzoin,Myrrh,Fig,Sandalwood,Mandarin Orange,Tonka Bean,Cedar

short_description: Unforgivable  by  Sean John  is a Aromatic Fougere fragrance for men.  Unforgivable  was launched in 2006. Unforgivable was created by David Apel, Pierre Negrin, AureÌlien Guichard and Caroline Sabas. Top notes are Tangerine, Green Mandarin, Grapefruit, Sicilian Lemon, Bergamot, Birch Leaf, Basil and Juniper; middle notes are Lavender, Clary Sage and Iris; base notes are Rum, Cashmere Wood, Australian Sandalwood, Tonka Bean and Amber. This perfume is the winner of award  FiFi Award Fragrance Of The Year Men`s Luxe 2007 .

Unforgivable Women  by  Sean John  is a Oriental Floral fragrance for women.  Unforgivable Women  was launched in 2007. The nose behind this fragrance is David Apel. Top notes are Pear, Bitter Orange, Apple, Cassia, Grapefruit, Neroli and Bergamot; middle notes are Jasmine, Freesia, Orange Blossom, Violet, Cyclamen, Rose and Lily-of-the-Valley; base notes are Sandalwood, Patchouli, Iris, Tonka Bean, Cedar, Vanilla, Amber, Oakmoss and Vetiver.
long_description:
Woman perfume in floriental version was introduced in 2007.
It was designed by David Apel, who made top notes out of bergamot, Pina Collada, bitter orange, orange blossom petals, cassia, grapefruit, apple and pear. The heart notes introduce us with floral rhythm of orange blossom, jasmine, violet, lily-of-the-valley, cyclamen and rose. Base notes offer us gentle touch of amber along with Tonk beans, vanilla, cedar, sandal, oak moss, patchoulis and Coco de Mer (Lodoicea maldivica).
The perfume is available in the amount of 75 and 125 ml edt. The bottle represents architectural connection of modernism and classicism.

perfume_name: Acqua di Colonia Santa Maria Novella
short_description: Acqua di Colonia  by  Santa Maria Novella  is a Citrus Aromatic fragrance for women and men.  Acqua di Colonia  was launched in 1533. Top notes are Bergamot, Neroli, Amalfi Lemon and Tangerine; middle notes are Lavender, Petitgrain, Clove and Rosemary; base note is Benzoin.
long_description:
Acqua di Colonia, also known as Acqua della Regina, was originally created in 1533 by Dominican friars for the Queen Caterina de' Medici. The composition consists of fresh essences of bergamot, citruses, white flowers and exotic spices.  
 It is available as 100 and 250 ml eau de cologne.

short_description: Lovely  by  Sarah Jessica Parker  is a Floral Woody Musk fragrance for women.  Lovely  was launched in 2005. Lovely was created by Clement Gavarry and Laurent Le Guernec. Top notes are Lavender, Martini, Bergamot, Mandarin Orange and Palisander Rosewood; middle notes are Patchouli, Orchid and Narcissus; base notes are Musk, Woodsy Notes, Cedar and White Amber. This perfume is the winner of award  FiFi Award Best National Advertising Campaign / TV 2006 .
long_description:
Lovely is the first fragrance by Sarah Jessica Parker (in partnership with Coty Inc.). Obsessed with style and fashion, Sarah always wanted to create a signature scent that would be very sexy and yet undeniably classy. Lovely "pays homage to her mother and the art of perfumery."Â She did not want her fragrance to be overpowering, but instantly recognizable, like the aromatic concoction she made for herself from threeÂ separate fragrances before she co-created Lovely. 
 Lovely is a soft, powdery, discreet,Â and very intimate fragrance, announced as a "silky white amber fragrance."Â It possesses an elegance characteristic of classic fragrances, and yet the fragrance is quite modern and very charming. 
 It opens with soft citruses and woody (rosewood) notes, with a touch of lavender, which is not at all sharp. The fragrance develops further with notes of apple martini, paperwhites (narcissus),Â and orchid. The base unites white amber, cedar, woody note,s and white musk. 
 According to Sarah, the perfume is appropriate for all generations: "from 17 to 107."Â The fragrance was created by Laurent Le Guernec and Clement Gavarry in 2005 with Sarah herself being the creative director, actively participating in the process from its start to finish.

short_description: Covet  by  Sarah Jessica Parker  is a Floral Woody Musk fragrance for women.  Covet  was launched in 2007. Covet was created by Ann Gottlieb and Frank Voelkl. Top notes are Sicilian Lemon, Lavender, Dark Chocolate and Pelargonium Leaf; middle notes are Lily-of-the-Valley, Honeysuckle and Magnolia; base notes are Musk, Cashmere Wood, Teak Wood, Vetiver and Amber.
long_description:
After launching two successful fragrances, the  Sex and the City  celebrity Sarah Jessica Parker has launched a new one. After Lovely, created in 2005, a fragrance that was supposed to express the light and tender side of her character, and Lovely Liquid Satin in 2006, she is now presenting the more aggressive and desirable Covet, a fragrance that captures impish and garrulous Sarah.  
 
 SJP's new fragrance was promoted on August 7, 2007 in NYC, at the Herald Square Macy's, under the slogan "I had to have it!" The perfume was created by Frank VÃ¶elkl of Firmenich in collaboration with fragrance designer and consultant Ann Gottlieb. The bottle was designed by Chad Levigne. 
 
 Covet opens with intensive spicy-green-mint note of geranium leaves, bright and luminous Sicilian lemon, lavender, and warm and slightly spicy chocolate notes. The heart notes are honeysuckle, magnolia, and lily of the valley. The base is darker, composed of cashmere wood, musk, vetiver, teak wood and amber. It comes in 50 ml and 100 ml bottles, and with matching body products. 
 
 See Covet TV commercial

short_description: SJP NYC  by  Sarah Jessica Parker  is a Floral Fruity fragrance for women.  SJP NYC  was launched in 2009. The nose behind this fragrance is Honorine Blanc. Top notes are Strawberry, Italian Mandarin and Osmanthus; middle notes are Honeysuckle, Rose, Gardenia and Mimosa; base notes are Rum, Vanille, White Musk and Sandalwood.
long_description:
SJP NYC is a new fragrance by Sarah Jessica Parker, presented in cooperation with Coty Prestige, as "Sex and The City" alter ego of popular actress, Carrie Bradshow.
 
 On the very top of the stopper, SJP NYC is inscribed as detail which inspired creators and made a link between the popular series (movie) and the new fragrant edition.
 
 "A large part of the inspiration was what I now understand to be peopleâ€™s impressions of seeing Carrie Bradshaw walk down the street and what feelings that evokes for her and for them â€” a real sense of freedom and possibilities, a love for the city around her and, of course, fashion,â€ Parker told WWD. â€œWe started with this idea that we wanted to create something fun. We wanted to create a party in a bottle and reflect that in the packaging with a real sense of whimsy, fun and joie de vivre. And then we took it from there. Portability and fashion played key roles in the development of the packaging and overall concept.â€
 
 This fruity-floral fragrance was created by Honorine Blanc of Firmenich, who enriched top notes with mandarin from Italy, white osmanthus and wild strawberries. A heart of SJP NYC incorporates gardenia, honeysuckle, mimosa and red Damascena rose, while a base includes vanilla absolute, sandalwood, rum and creamy musk.
 
 Sarah Jessica Parker is very surprised with sophisticated notes of accentuated elegant floral bouquet, because she expected sweet, fruity notes of strawberries and more youthful nuances. Strawberries contribute to harmony and balance of the floral composition with musk Sarah adores and prefers as ingredient in her perfumes.
 
 The collection encompasses EDTs in three sizes (15ml, 30ml and 60ml), accompanied with 200 ml body lotion. A fragrant bracelet with solid perfume is announced for May 2010.
 
 SJP NYC package is unusual and made of a simple glass flacon in a cylindrical flacon which can be used for other purposes, as well. The tin package is illustrated with various motives, which remind of Sarah Jessica Parker's wardrobe and her love for fashion. "Fashion's in the air" announced Sarah Jessica Parker!

short_description: Obscuro  by  Santa Eulalia  is a Woody Spicy fragrance for women and men.  Obscuro  was launched in 2014. The nose behind this fragrance is Celso Fadelli.

perfume_name: Crocus Eau de Parfum Santa Eulalia
short_description: Crocus Eau de Parfum  by  Santa Eulalia  is a fragrance for women and men.  Crocus Eau de Parfum  was launched in 2021. Top notes are Saffron, Rum, Juniper Berries, Cypress and Red Fruits; middle notes are Immortelle, Petitgrain, Violet and Pepper; base notes are Sandalwood, Patchouli, Vetiver, Amber, Vanilla, Incense, Moss and Musk.

Signorina In Fiore  by  Salvatore Ferragamo  is a Floral Fruity fragrance for women.  Signorina In Fiore  was launched in 2017. The nose behind this fragrance is Emilie Bevierre-Coppermann. Top notes are Pomegranate, Sorbet and Pear; middle notes are Cherry Blossom and Jasmine; base notes are White Musk and Sandalwood.
long_description:
Signorina Fiore, the new perfume from the Signorina collection by Italian house Salvatore Ferragamo, comes out in 2017, after the original Signorina from 2011, Eau de Toilette version from 2012, Signorina Eleganza version from 2014 and Signorina Misteriosa from 2016. The new fragrance is signed by Emilie (Bevierre) Coppermann.  
  Top notes: nashi pear sorbet and pomegranate. Heart: cherry blossom and jasmine. Base: white musk and sandalwood.  
 It is available as an Eau de Toilette.

short_description: Incense Suede  by  Salvatore Ferragamo  is a Leather fragrance for women and men.  Incense Suede  was launched in 2014. Top notes are Incense and Pink Pepper; middle notes are Leather and Saffron; base notes are Styrax and Mate.

Signorina Eleganza  by  Salvatore Ferragamo  is a Chypre Floral fragrance for women.  Signorina Eleganza  was launched in 2014. The nose behind this fragrance is Sophie Labbe. Top notes are Pear and Grapefruit; middle notes are Osmanthus and Almond; base notes are Patchouli and Leather.
long_description:
Elegance has always been a defining element of Salvatore Ferragamo creations. Full of grace and refinement, they are further
enhanced by the impeccable taste for which the Florentine brand is famous worldwide.
In tribute to this sophistication, Salvatore Ferragamo presents Signorina Eleganza, a luxurious fragrance that celebrates feminine
grace and seduction. 
 The fresh head notes of grapefruit and pear are a vivacious and
stimulating introduction. 
 
Almond powder and golden osmanthus petals create a delicate yet
intense heart, adding a touch of indulgent luxury. 
 
The base notes of patchouli and white leather create a dry-down
effect that leaves a luscious, lingering scent on the skin. 
 The packaging of Signorina Eleganza in a nude beige palette
conveys a delicate and refined charm. The Eleganza logo in
embossed gold adds an extra touch of excellence. 
 
The precious golden base engraved with the logo in relief gives
the bottle a magnificent appearance while the famous gros grain
Vara bow comes in two shades of beige.
 
 Salvatore Ferragamo celebrates chic young women creating a unique style signature of timeless modernity, creativity and a hint of audacity.
A girl playing with her different characters: sophisticated and cheeky, like Signorina Eau de Parfum, elegant and seductive like Signorina Eleganza and unpredictably mysterious like
Signorina Misteriosa ...because Signorina is a different Signorina every day.
â€œMy life is a playâ€ is her credo: Grace Hartzel perfectly embodies the three personalities of Signorina deciding when and how to let the play start, but always remaining the same person.
#mylifeisaplay
 
  Signorina Eleganza is available in three sizes: 30, 50 and 100ml EDP. Perfumer is Sophie Labbe from IFF.

short_description: Incanto Bloom  by  Salvatore Ferragamo  is a Floral fragrance for women.  Incanto Bloom  was launched in 2010. The nose behind this fragrance is Sophie Labbe. Top notes are Freesia and Grapefruit; middle notes are Tea Rose and Champaca; base notes are White Musk and Cashmere Wood.
long_description: Incanto Bloom is a new fragrance in the line of Incanto fragrances and can be expected on the market in March 2010. Creator of the perfume is Sophie Labbe and the composition encompasses grapefruit blossom, freesia, tea rose, champaca, musk and cahmere. The fragrance arrives as 30, 50 and 90ml edt in a flacon designed by Sylvie de France.

short_description: Incanto Shine  by  Salvatore Ferragamo  is a Floral Fruity fragrance for women.  Incanto Shine  was launched in 2007. The nose behind this fragrance is Karine Dubreuil-Sereni. Top notes are Pineapple, Passionfruit and Bergamot; middle notes are Peach, Pink Peony and Freesia; base notes are Musk, Cedar and Amber.
long_description: Incanto Shine was launched in MarchÂ 2007 by Salvatore Ferragamo. It is a fruity floral fragranceÂ in a colourful bottle adorned with carefree summer motifs. It starts with fresh notes of pineapple, bergamot, and passion fruit. Pink peony, freesia, and peach are at its heart. The base consists of cedar, amber, and musk.

short_description: Signorina  by  Salvatore Ferragamo  is a Floral Fruity fragrance for women.  Signorina  was launched in 2011. Signorina was created by Sophie Labbe and Juliette Karagueuzoglou. Top notes are Pink Pepper and Black Currant; middle notes are Rose, Peony and Jasmine; base notes are Panacotta, Musk and Patchouli.
long_description:
Signorina is a celebration of chic girls with a sophisticated, subtly cheeky and fresh scent signature. A new fragrance creation with the elegant and all Italian style by Salvatore Ferragamo. A fragrance inspired by the strong bond between Salvatore Ferragamo and trendy feminine young ladies with timeless modernity, creativity and a hint of audacity. 
 
 Signorina, a lovely and chic Italian name that literally means young woman. Stylish, truly Italian, fresh and full of life.
 
 
The bright fizzy notes of currant spiced by fresh pink pepper bring their joyful, cheeky character to green notes. A generous dewy floral heart is composed of elegant jasmine, pink peony and rose. Spontaneous and delicate sweetness of pannacotta together with soft musks and intriguing woody patchouli notes offer a racy Italian elegance and an unexpected addictiveness.
 
 Olfactive Family: Floriental Fruity
 
 Perfumers: Sophie Labbe, Juliette Karagueuzoglou (IFF) 
 Signorina`s flacon is a statement of subtle elegance and grace. The squared design recalls a precious jewel box. On top, the flacon shows a reinterpretation of the iconic Vara bow in gros grain in two cheeky pink shades. A lovely bubble of pink gold completes this sophisticated creations with a touch of irony. The outer packaging is gracefully decorated with pink gold frames, that give a light and iconic style. The Salvatore Ferragamo logo is embossed on the top and elegantly seals the box. A perfect blend of style and freshness. 
 Salvatore Ferragamo celebrates chic young women creating a unique style signature of timeless modernity, creativity and a hint of audacity.
A girl playing with her different characters: sophisticated and cheeky, like Signorina Eau de Parfum, elegant and seductive like Signorina Eleganza and unpredictably mysterious like
Signorina Misteriosa ...because Signorina is a different Signorina every day.
â€œMy life is a playâ€ is her credo: Grace Hartzel perfectly embodies the three personalities of Signorina deciding when and how to let the play start, but always remaining the same person.
#mylifeisaplay

short_description: Ferragamo Intense Leather  by  Salvatore Ferragamo  is a Leather fragrance for men.  Ferragamo Intense Leather  was launched in 2021. Top notes are Mandarin Orange, Pink Pepper and Clary Sage; middle notes are Red Apple, Iris and Lily-of-the-Valley; base notes are Leather, Earthy Notes, Oakmoss and Musk.

Attimo  by  Salvatore Ferragamo  is a Floral fragrance for women.  Attimo  was launched in 2010. The nose behind this fragrance is Jean-Pierre Bethouart. Top notes are Pear and Lotus; middle notes are Gardenia, Peony and Frangipani; base notes are Musk, Patchouli and Virginia Cedar.
long_description:
Attimo ("Moment") is a new fragrance for women by the house of Salvatore Ferragamo arriving on the market in September 2010. The fragrance encompasses a floral bouquet laid on a warm, elegant, woody base. 
 The composition of this fragrance will not be similar to the other candy-like, flirtatious editions, but the accent will be on elegance and fine, floral notes. 
 The top notes of Attimo offer fruity aromas of nashi pear and delicate lotus flower. TheÂ heart incorporates a floral blend of gardenia, peony, and frangipani, while theÂ base features a trail of musk, cedar, and patchouli. 
 The fragrance arrives in a transparentÂ glass flacon, and the liquid is coloured in gentle beige.

perfume_name: So Dupont Pour Femme S.T. Dupont
short_description: So Dupont Pour Femme  by  S.T. Dupont  is a Floral Woody Musk fragrance for women.  So Dupont Pour Femme  was launched in 2014. Top notes are Pear, Blackberry, Ylang-Ylang and Hyacinth; middle notes are Peony, Magnolia, Lily-of-the-Valley and Jasmine; base notes are Musk, Sandalwood, Patchouli and Cedar.
long_description: The composition of women's fragrance opens with a romantic mix of flowers such as hyacinth and ylang-ylang sweetened by fruit juices of blackberries and pears. The heart is a romantic bouquet of peony, jasmine, lily of the valley and magnolia, laid at the base of woody notes of sandalwood, patchouli, cedar and musk. So Dupont Pour Femme is available in a glass bottle with a pink bow in quantities of 30, 50 and 100 ml Eau de Parfum. The fragrance is constructed as floral-woody-musky, slightly sweetened by fruit.

short_description: Amo Ferragamo  by  Salvatore Ferragamo  is a Oriental Floral fragrance for women.  Amo Ferragamo  was launched in 2018. The nose behind this fragrance is Marie Salamagne. Top notes are Campari, Black Currant and Rosemary; middle notes are Rhubarb, Jasmine Sambac and Mate; base notes are Tahitian Vanilla, Ambroxan and Sandalwood.

perfume_name: So Dupont Pour Homme S.T. Dupont
short_description: So Dupont Pour Homme  by  S.T. Dupont  is a Woody Aromatic fragrance for men.  So Dupont Pour Homme  was launched in 2014. Top notes are Grapefruit, White Pepper and Bergamot; middle notes are Apple, Mint and Cedar; base notes are Tonka Bean, Vanilla and Sandalwood.
long_description: Men's fragrance ST Dupont Pour Homme comes in an elegant bottle of 30, 50 and 100ml Eau de Toilette, conceptualized as a woody-aromatic fragrance with spicy touch. The top notes of the composition include bergamot, grapefruit and white pepper, followed by icy mint, apple and cedar in the heart. The base is warmer and more comfortable with notes of tonka bean, vanilla and sandalwood.

short_description: S.T. Dupont Noir  by  S.T. Dupont  is a Woody Spicy fragrance for men.  S.T. Dupont Noir  was launched in 2006. The nose behind this fragrance is Michel Girard. Top notes are Lavender, Cardamom and Mint; middle notes are Nutmeg and Cloves; base notes are Hazelnut, Cashmere Wood and Vetiver.

Emozione  by  Salvatore Ferragamo  is a Chypre Floral fragrance for women.  Emozione  was launched in 2015. The nose behind this fragrance is Alberto Morillas. Top notes are Iris, Peach and Bergamot; middle notes are Heliotrope, Peony and Bulgarian Rose; base notes are White Musk, Suede and Patchouli.
long_description:
Salvatore Ferragamo launches new fragrance for women Emozione, which arrives on the market in February 2015. Emozione has been announced as extremely feminine fragrance which is classic, contemporary and elegant. The composition is chypre-floral with woody undertones, created to highlight emotions and pleasures that life offers.  
 
Emozione opens with luminous citrus notes of bergamot, softened with soft and powdery flavors of iris. Top notes are enriched with velvety shades of peach providing fullness and velvety effect. The heart incorporates gentle, feminine flowers of peony combined with Bulgarian rose and heliotrope, resting on patchouli, suede and white musk in the base of the composition.  
 
Fragrance Emozione can be obtained as 30, 50 and 92ml Eau de Parfum. Advertising face is the model model Malgosia Bela who will be featured in black and white advertising campaign signed by Mert Alas and Marcus Piggott.

short_description: S.T. Dupont Rose  by  S.T. Dupont  is a Floral Fruity fragrance for women.  S.T. Dupont Rose  was launched in 2009. The nose behind this fragrance is Christiane Plos. Top notes are Amalfi Lemon, Pear, Mandarin Orange and Violet; middle notes are Rose, Iris, Peony and Jasmine; base notes are Musk, Virginia Cedar and Vetiver.
long_description:
A floral-fruity fragrance is perfect for April, along with pleasant spring breezes and sweetest infatuations which appear in this time of year. In days when everything seems romantic, joyful and pink, the house of S.T. Dupont, presents a very pink fragrance, S.T. Dupont Rose, which is characterized with essences of attractive, irresistible and mysterious woman.
 
 
S.T. Dupont Rose is velvety, smooth and unique like a rose petal; it has classic style and natural aromas. The perfume is fresh and free, composed of a bouquet of roses surrounded with floral and fruity aromas along with woody accords and musk. Creator of the perfume is Christiane Plos. 
 Top notes of S.T.Dupont Rose include lemon and mandarin, which introduce a pleasant overture with its luminous accords together with pear zest and violet extract. A heart adds strong and dominant Bulgarian rose aromas, with floral companionship of peony, iris and Indian jasmine, which are in charge of naturalness and freshness. A base incorporates cedar from Virginia, musk and vetiver, which complete and finish the composition.
 
 
The bottle has the same form as S.T.Dupont Blanc and S.T. Dupont Noir. It is modern and special, coloured in pink and decorated with a white logo. The fragrance has been available since 2009.

perfume_name: S.T. Dupont Intense Pour Femme S.T. Dupont
short_description: S.T. Dupont Intense Pour Femme  by  S.T. Dupont  is a Oriental Floral fragrance for women.  S.T. Dupont Intense Pour Femme  was launched in 2009. The nose behind this fragrance is Antoine Lie. Top notes are Neroli, Bergamot, Citruses and Green Notes; middle notes are Mimosa, African Orange Flower and Rose; base notes are Sandalwood, Amber and Musk.
long_description:
S.T.Dupont Intense Pour Femme and S.T.Dupont Intense Pour Homme make a new luxurious duo by the house of S.T.Dupont which continues tradition and shows the art which has been inherent to this house for years. Aromas of the new fragrance nurture the style of previous compositions created in ultimately elegant way.
 
 S.T.Dupont Intense Pour Femme introduces floral-oriental aromas announced as an ode to femininity. Perfumer of the edition is Antoine Lie. Top notes open with luminous union of bergamot, citruses and neroli surrounded with green nuances of fresh leaves. A heart offers gentleness of orange blossom, Turkish rose and mimosa, while base notes leave an exciting trail of creamy-woody accords of sandalwood, amber and musk. The fragrance arrives in a characteristic cylindrical flacon (S.T.Dupont Pour Femme 1998 edition) in dark blue nuances with a silver stopper.

short_description: Passenger for Men  by  S.T. Dupont  is a Woody Spicy fragrance for men.  Passenger for Men  was launched in 2008. Top notes are Citruses and Violet Leaf; middle notes are Ginger, Pink Pepper, Cardamom and Lavender; base notes are Guaiac Wood and Benzoin.
long_description:
S.T.Dupont Company goes back to its roots, art of traveling, and invites us for adventures and wandering with perfume pair presented in 2008, Passenger for Women and Passenger for Men.
 
 Explosion of citruses with violet leaves start a strong and energic composition
of Passenger for Men. A heart adds spices, Indian ginger, cardamom from Guatemala, pink pepper and lavender. This fragrant journey finishes with Guaiac wood from Paraguay and benzoin from Laos which brings us a sound of unique natural aromas of dark leather. 
 Passenger for Men is available as 30, 50 and 100ml edt.

short_description: Royal Amber  by  S.T. Dupont  is a Oriental fragrance for women and men.  Royal Amber  was launched in 2017.
long_description:
S.T. Dupont is sending us a new invitation to escape on an incredible olfactory journey, to the Palace of A Thousand and One Nights: Collection S.T. Dupont. 
 Royal Oriental is an evocation of the magnificent Mashrabiyas of Middle Eastern palaces, enhanced by an intense leathery amber fragrance.

short_description: Passenger for Women  by  S.T. Dupont  is a Floral fragrance for women.  Passenger for Women  was launched in 2008. Top notes are Pear, Bergamot, Black Currant and Mandarin Orange; middle notes are Gardenia, Cyclamen and Rose; base notes are Musk, Sandalwood and Iris.
long_description:
S.T.Dupont Company goes back to its roots, art of traveling, and invites us for adventures and wandering with perfume pair presented in 2008, Passenger for Women and Passenger for Men.  
 Passenger for Women is a fragrant date in a garden full of juicy citruses, green mandarin and bergamot which blend with juiciness of pear and black currant zest. A heart encompasses cyclamen, gardenia and rose, while base notes bring us warm breath of iris. Sandalwood and musk leave s silky soft trail on the skin.  
 This fragrance is available as 30, 50 and 100ml EDP.

short_description: Miss Dupont  by  S.T. Dupont  is a Oriental Floral fragrance for women.  Miss Dupont  was launched in 2010. Top notes are Peach, Grapefruit and Galbanum; middle notes are Rose, Sandalwood and Vetiver; base notes are Vanille and Amber.
long_description:
S.T. Dupont launches its new perfume this year: the ultra feminine and very glamorous Miss Dupont. Miss Dupont addresses modern and eccentric ladies full of confidence and desire for luxury. It is the scent of a woman who undeniably leaves a mark, ominously irresistible. 
 The floral - oriental compositions opens with sparks of fresh peaches, grapefruit and galbanum. The charming ladyâ€™s heart is built around rose, with additional oriental - wood notes of sandalwood and vetiver oil. The depth and intensity are obtained by the base of amber, musk and vanilla, which releases the female sensuality, making this the ideal evening choice of a perfume. 
 The bottle of Miss Dupont fragrance is inspired by the famous ST Dupont GuillochÃ© design. GuillochÃ© is a decorative engraving technique which creates lines and curves with precise rotating movement. Silver stopper provides some extra glamour to the whole design. The box is a symbol of brilliance and success, with a metallic colored pattern of diamond surface and pink ribbon containing the monogram of the house. 
 Miss Dupont is available as 30, 50 and 75 ml EDP.

short_description: Oud & Rose  by  S.T. Dupont  is a Oriental Floral fragrance for women and men.  Oud & Rose  was launched in 2017.
long_description:
S.T. Dupont is sending us a new invitation to escape on an incredible olfactory journey, to the Palace of A Thousand and One Nights: Collection S.T. Dupont. 
 Oud and Rose is a romantic interpretation of the iconic â€œDâ€ of the brand, highlighted by a powerful woody floral fragrance.

perfume_name: 58 Avenue Montaigne pour Femme S.T. Dupont
short_description: 58 Avenue Montaigne pour Femme  by  S.T. Dupont  is a Floral Fruity fragrance for women.  58 Avenue Montaigne pour Femme  was launched in 2012. The nose behind this fragrance is Nathalie Feisthauer. Top notes are Raspberry, Black Currant and Lemon; middle notes are Cyclamen, Violet and Jasmine; base notes are Panacotta, Musk and Patchouli.
long_description:
The new line of fragrances by S.T. Dupont, made in urban and contemporary spirit, is named after the location of the S.T. Dupont luxurious goods famous boutique. 58 Avenue Montaigne pour Femme and 58 Avenue Montaigne pour Homme are perfumes designed to combine tradition and modernity, French style and prestige. 
 58 Avenue Montaigne pour Femme is a bright and clean fragrance that exudes the elegance of Paris. It opens with fruity aromas of raspberry, black currant and lemon. The heart includes refined jasmine, cyclamen and violet. Delicious Italian dessert red fruit Panacotta is blended with intense accords of patchouli and musk in the base. 
 The feminine fragrance is available as 30, 50 and 90 ml Eau de Parfum.

perfume_name: Dupont Oud et Rose S.T. Dupont
short_description: Dupont Oud et Rose  by  S.T. Dupont  is a Oriental Floral fragrance for women and men.  Dupont Oud et Rose  was launched in 2012. Top notes are Agarwood (Oud), Saffron and Vanilla; middle notes are Rose, Patchouli and Musk; base notes are Sandalwood and Amber.

perfume_name: Rosendo Mateu NÂº 5 Floral, Amber, Sensual Musk Rosendo Mateu Olfactive Expressions
short_description: Rosendo Mateu NÂº 5 Floral, Amber, Sensual Musk  by  Rosendo Mateu Olfactive Expressions  is a Oriental Floral fragrance for women and men.  Rosendo Mateu NÂº 5 Floral, Amber, Sensual Musk  was launched in 2017. The nose behind this fragrance is Rosendo Mateu. Top notes are Spices and Exotic floral notes; middle notes are Carnation and Lily-of-the-Valley; base notes are Amber, Vanilla and Musk.

perfume_name: United Arab Emirates Spirit Of The Union Roja Dove
short_description: United Arab Emirates Spirit Of The Union  by  Roja Dove  is a Oriental Woody fragrance for women and men.  United Arab Emirates Spirit Of The Union  was launched in 2014. Top notes are Mandarin Orange and Aldehydes; middle notes are Orange Blossom, Tuberose, Rose de Mai, Jasmine, Jasmine Sambac, Apple, Ylang-Ylang and Heliotrope; base notes are Saffron, Agarwood (Oud), Amber, Suede, Cashmere Wood, Benzoin, Leather, Labdanum, Musk, Grass, Cloves, Cinnamon, Patchouli, Cypriol Oil or Nagarmotha, Sandalwood, Balsam Fir, Birch Tar and Vanilla.
base_notes: Saffron,Agarwood (Oud),Amber,Suede,Cashmere Wood,Benzoin,Leather,Labdanum,Musk,Grass,Cloves,Cinnamon,Patchouli,Cypriol Oil or Nagarmotha,Sandalwood,Balsam Fir,Birch Tar,Vanilla

short_description: United Arab Emirates  by  Roja Dove  is a Oriental fragrance for women and men.  United Arab Emirates  was launched in 2017. The nose behind this fragrance is Roja Dove. Top notes are Artemisia and Bergamot; middle notes are Rose de Mai, Cloves, Geranium, Labdanum, Cassis, Ylang-Ylang and Jasmine; base notes are Agarwood (Oud), Musk, Cypriol Oil or Nagarmotha, Cumin, Guaiac Wood, Pink Pepper, Benzoin, Labdanum, Olibanum, Patchouli and Oakmoss.
long_description:
"Bergamot and Artemisia create a fresh foil for a bouquet of Jasmine, Ylang Ylang, Geranium, and a dominant note of Rose Taif, further freshened by Blackcurrant Buds, where a blend of Clove Buds, Pink Pepper, and Cumin add their liveliness, the whole sublimated by the warmth of Guaiac and Aoud Woods, Patchouli, Oakmoss, and Cypriol, nestling on an ultra-soft, sensual base of Benzoin, Frankincense, Labdanum, Cistus, and Musk." - a note from the brand. 
United Arab Emirates by Roja Dove is a Oriental fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. United Arab Emirates was launched in 2017. The nose behind this fragrance is Roja Dove. short_description: Semi-Bespoke No. 14  by  Roja Dove  is a Chypre fragrance for women and men. The nose behind this fragrance is Roja Dove. long_description:
"To celebrate the launch of our new Roja Parfums area in Bergdorf Goodman, I have created this limited-edition scent for the store that steals my heart each time I visit New York. I hope you fall in love with this rare scent. Only 100 pieces will ever exist, so keep it close to your heart."Â - Roja Dove.Â  
 "An ultra-soft harmony of Peach and Jasmine at the heart of this creation is freshened by a note of succulent Blackcurrant on an enveloping Oriental base of Sandal Wood, Benzoin, and Vanilla underscored by a whisper of Musk."Â - Roja Dove.

Roja Haute Luxe  by  Roja Dove  is a Chypre Floral fragrance for women and men.  Roja Haute Luxe  was launched in 2013. The nose behind this fragrance is Roja Dove. Top note is Bergamot; middle notes are Ylang-Ylang, Jasmine and Rose de Mai; base notes are Benzoin, Oakmoss, Cloves, Cinnamon, Iris, Vanilla, Labdanum, Amber, Ginger, Styrax, Patchouli, Amyris, Vetiver and Cedar.
long_description:
â€œI made this creation using all the materials I love the most...everything about this fragrance is very personal including its presentation. For the case, I could think of no colour more luxurious then white as it is the most fragile of colours. The gold leaf within the fragrance alludes to my love of gold but also serves as a reminder that the amber liquid - â€˜the juiceâ€™ - is in fact rarer, more precious, more expensive than gold will ever be. The amber colour of the fragrance is a result of the finest quality natural ingredients; it makes me think of rare coloured diamonds. I like to think of ROJA Haute Luxe as a liquid jewel.â€ 
 "Formulated without reference to cost, ROJA Haute Luxe is a perfume created using each of the ingredients Roja loves most to build a deep, rich, resinous chyprÃ© that is quite simply the worldâ€™s most exquisite Haute Luxe parfum; a fragrance of rarity, refined perfection and unrivalled beauty." 
 Roja by Roja Dove is a Chypre Floral fragrance for women and men. This is a new fragrance. Roja was launched in 2013. perfume_name: Roja Dove Haute Parfumerie 15th Anniversary Roja Dove
short_description: Roja Dove Haute Parfumerie 15th Anniversary  by  Roja Dove  is a Oriental Floral fragrance for women and men.  Roja Dove Haute Parfumerie 15th Anniversary  was launched in 2019. The nose behind this fragrance is Roja Dove. Top notes are Aldehydes, Bergamot, Orange, Grapefruit, Lemon and Mandarin Orange; middle notes are Violet, Peach, Labdanum, Heliotrope, Jasmine, Lily-of-the-Valley, Champaca and Geranium; base notes are Iris, Cashmirwood, Labdanum, Vanilla, Moss, Patchouli, Sandalwood, Tonka Bean, Amyris, Civet, Ambrarome, Benzoin, Ginger, Olibanum, Vetiver, Peru Balsam, Coriander, Pepper and Musk.

Risque  by  Roja Dove  is a Chypre Floral fragrance for women.  Risque  was launched in 2012. The nose behind this fragrance is Roja Dove. Top notes are Bergamot, Lemon and Litsea Cubeba; middle notes are Chamomile, Hyacinth, Rose, Jasmine and Ylang-Ylang; base notes are Oakmoss, Civet, Patchouli, Vetiver, Labdanum and Cedar.
long_description: The opening is, indeed, surprising - a confident Chypre that has a dry warmth with a refreshing after burst that quickly melds with the heart notes and becomes quite intoxicating. All that Rose and Jasmine build and build, intermingling with the mosses and the narcotically sumptuous Hyacinth and finally releasing you into the deeply sublime drydown of the base notes, with the Civet practically cackling with glee as it reels you in. In lesser hands, this perfume could have seemed old-fashioned or brashly obvious, but Roja Parfums have created in RisquÃ© a glittering bombshell who beckons you with silken gloves, leaves lipstick on your cocktail glass and a trail of exotic plumage in its glamorous wake.

short_description: Reckless  by  Roja Dove  is a Oriental Floral fragrance for women.  Reckless  was launched in 2011. The nose behind this fragrance is Roja Dove. Top notes are Aldehydes, Citruses, Bergamot and Tarragon; middle notes are Jasmine, Ylang-Ylang, Peach, Rose, Geranium, Violet and Amaryllis; base notes are oak moss, Cinnamon, Castoreum, Leather, Clove, Sandalwood, Musk, Orris Root, Tonka Bean and Vetiver.

perfume_name: Reckless Pour Femme Essence De Parfum Roja Dove
short_description: Reckless Pour Femme Essence De Parfum  by  Roja Dove  is a Floral fragrance for women.  Reckless Pour Femme Essence De Parfum  was launched in 2021. Top notes are Mandarin Orange, Orange and Bergamot; middle notes are Neroli, Jasmine, May Rose and Geranium; base notes are Vanilla, Musk, Cinnamon, Benzoin, Sandalwood, Styrax, Coriander and Pink Pepper.
long_description:
The spirit of following your heart whilst being nobodyâ€™s fool, Reckless is the scent of the woman who is willing to take risks to get what she wants. Carefree but never careless, her sunny disposition finds her creating her own rules of enjoyment and indulgence. A bright, citrus burst of Bergamot, Mandarin and Orange is further enlivened by playful Spices, as cool Rose de Mai and warm Neroli create a sweet and balanced duet which is complimented by a mouth-watering addition of Benzoin and Vanilla on a rich bed of Sandalwood. Unapologetically playful, allow it settle on your skin and take you to where you want to be. 
 Opening with a trio of zesty citrus fruits, Bergamot, Mandarin and Orange introduce Reckless as a bright and energetic Floral creation with an invigorating hint of Coriander and Pink Pepper to up the excitement factor. The sweet elegance of a central Rose note is enhanced to fresher heights by Geranium, whilst the creaminess of a focal Neroli flower is given a further sensuality through an addition of Jasmine. Beneath this easy-going character, a layering of Benzoin and Vanilla enhance the natural sweetness of these petals, as the whole settles onto a bed of legendary Sandalwood - a material whose warm, creamy sweetness ties the entirety up beautifully.

perfume_name: Pierre de Velay No. 56 Roja Dove
short_description: Pierre de Velay No. 56  by  Roja Dove  is a Chypre fragrance for women and men.  Pierre de Velay No. 56  was launched in 2017. The nose behind this fragrance is Roja Dove. Top notes are Bergamot and Lavender; middle notes are May Rose, Violet, Geranium and Ylang-Ylang; base notes are Agarwood (Oud), Saffron, Leather, Orris Root, Caraway, Pepper, Sandalwood, Patchouli, Vanilla, Opoponax, Musk, Cinnamon, Nutmeg, Oakmoss, Benzoin, Labdanum and Cashmere Wood.
long_description: "A warm base of Aoud, Casmir, and Sandal Woods, Oakmoss, Patchouli, and Caraway is enlivened by Pepper, Cinnamon, Nutmeg, and Saffron, where Vanilla, Opoponax, Benzoin, Orris, leather-like Labdanum, Leather, and Musk brings softness and sensuality, sweetened by a bouquet of Geranium, Ylang Ylang, and Violet in the heart of this creation, the whole freshened by Bergamot, Litsea Cubeba, and aromatic Lavender."Â - Roja Dove.

long_description: "A soft, sensual base of Vanilla, Tolu Balsam, Orris Sur CÃ¨dre, Tonka Bean, Labdanum, Ambrarome Absolute, Castoreum, Civet, and Musk, warmed by Cedar, Sandal, and Guaiac Woods, Patchouli, Oakmoss, and Birch, made lively through the inclusion of Clove and Saffron, where a bouquet of Jasmine, Ylang Ylang, May Blossom, and Violet adds its sweetness, the whole counterpointed by the freshness of Bergamot, Lemon, Clary Sage, and Violet Leaves."Â - Roja Dove.

perfume_name: Pierre de Velay No. 25 Roja Dove

Patchouli, Oakmoss, Cypriol, and Tolu Balsam, nestling on a soft, sensual base of Carrot Seed, Coffee, Vanilla, Tonka Bean, Orientalgris, and Musk."Â - Roja Dove.

Top notes are Citruses and Lemon; middle notes are Violet, Rose de Mai and Jasmine; base notes are Cedar, Rhubarb, Patchouli, Woody Notes, Orris Root, Oakmoss, Vetiver, Musk, Spicy Notes, Celery Seeds, Pepper and Vanilla.

perfume_name: Pierre de Velay No. 6 Roja Dove
short_description: Pierre de Velay No. 6  by  Roja Dove  is a Oriental fragrance for women and men.  Pierre de Velay No. 6  was launched in 2019. The nose behind this fragrance is Roja Dove. Top notes are Bay Leaf, Lemon, Clary Sage and Bergamot; middle notes are Davana, Rose de Mai, Jasmine, Ylang-Ylang and Labdanum; base notes are Juniper, Cardamom, Benzoin, Orris Root, elemi, Cloves, Nutmeg, Olibanum, Styrax, Leather, Castoreum, Cedar, Tonka Bean, Musk and Vetiver.

perfume_name: Pierre de Velay No. 4 Roja Dove

perfume_name: Pierre de Velay No. 16 Roja Dove
short_description: Pierre de Velay No. 16  by  Roja Dove  is a Floral Fruity fragrance for women.  Pierre de Velay No. 16  was launched in 2020. The nose behind this fragrance is Roja Dove. Top notes are Grapefruit, Bergamot and Lemon; middle notes are Peach, Lily-of-the-Valley, Ylang-Ylang, Violet, Rhubarb, Jasmine and Rose; base notes are Woody Notes, Vanilla, Orris, Galbanum and Cedar.
long_description:
"Sweet Sixteen celebrates the Perfumerâ€™s ability to create a sweet scent which totally avoids the juvenile world of high street spritzes and delivers the epitome of Haute Parfumerie. A sweet treat of a perfume, this vibrant and contemporary floral accord is nothing if not mouth-watering. Bright and fresh Citrus notes create a burst of juicy sweetness that is zesty and uplifting to a floral heart based around the creamy indulgence of Jasmine. Frangipani mingles with Jasmine, creating a tropical breeze, which carries upon it a succulent Pear-drop nuance typical of the finest quality Jasmine.Â  An energetic and dynamic scent, Number 16 presents sweetness in the softest and most succulent way possible. A touch of powder transforms the whole into something too tempting to resist, like the delicate dusting of powdered sugar, coating cubes of rosy Turkish Delight being enjoyed under the warmth of the sun. You couldnâ€™t be anywhere with a cloud in the sky when you experience Number 16. 
 Top Notes:Â Bergamot,Â Lemon,Â Grapefruit 
 Heart Notes:Â Lily of the Valley,Â Rose,Â Jasmine, Ylang-Ylang, Violet,Â Peach,Â Rhubarb 
 Base Notes:Â Galbanum, Cedarwood, Dry Woods, Orris, Vanilla" - a note from the brand.

perfume_name: Parfum De La Nuit No 3 Roja Dove
short_description: Parfum De La Nuit No 3  by  Roja Dove  is a Oriental Floral fragrance for women and men.  Parfum De La Nuit No 3  was launched in 2015. The nose behind this fragrance is Roja Dove. Top note is Bergamot; middle notes are Rose and Artemisia; base notes are Leather, Incense, Cumin, Amber, Saffron, Benzoin, Gurjan balsam, Styrax, Cardamom, Labdanum, Cypriol Oil or Nagarmotha, Sandalwood, Amyris, Patchouli, Cedar, Juniper and Guaiac Wood.
long_description:
"Exotic and mysterious, this enticing fragrance strips you of your inhibitions as it tempts you to experience the allure of the unknown". Roja Dove 
 The freshness of bergamot, amyris, and artemesia counterpoint a note of cool rose in the heart of this creation. A lively blend of cardamom, cumin, and saffron is warmed by cedar, sandal, guaiac, and juniper woods, made earthy by cypriol, gurjum, and patchouli, and underscored by a rich base of incense, styrax, benzoin, amber, cistus, leather-like labdanum, and other leather notes. 
 The fragrance is available as 100ml Perfume.

perfume_name: Parfum De La Nuit No 2 Roja Dove
short_description: Parfum De La Nuit No 2  by  Roja Dove  is a Oriental Vanilla fragrance for women and men.  Parfum De La Nuit No 2  was launched in 2015. The nose behind this fragrance is Roja Dove. Top notes are Orange, Bergamot and Lemon; middle notes are Rum and Coconut; base notes are Tolu Balsam, Benzoin, Tonka Bean, Guaiac Wood, Labdanum, Civet, Castoreum, Papyrus, Vetiver and Patchouli.
long_description:
"Soft warm and tantalising, this fragrance revels in the power of suggestion. The warmth of a touch, the excitement of a quick glance, No.2 is the master of seduction". Roja Dove 
 Rum accord is blended with cocoa at the heart of this creation, which is counterpointed by the freshness of citrus, lemon, and orange. Warmed by papyrus, patchouli, vetiver, and guaiac wood, the whole fragrance is sublimated by a soft, sensual base of cistus, labdanum, benzoin, tolu balsam, tonka bean, civet, and castoreum. 
 The fragrance is available as 100ml Perfume.

Top notes are Lavender, Grapefruit, Lemon, Lime, Bergamot, Mandarin Orange, Rosemary, Thyme and Litsea Cubeba; middle notes are Violet, Geranium, Jasmine, Jasmine Sambac and Ylang-Ylang; base notes are Musk, Iris, Juniper Berries, Moss, Cedar, Vetiver, Sandalwood, Labdanum, Galbanum, Benzoin and Vanilla.

short_description: O The Exclusive Parfum  by  Roja Dove  is a fragrance for women and men.  O The Exclusive Parfum  was launched in 2016. The nose behind this fragrance is Roja Dove. long_description: "Bergamot counterpoints the sweetness of Jasmine, Rose, and Osmanthus in this creation, enlivened by Pepper and Saffron, underscored by the warmth of Cedar, Amyris, Guaiac, and Aoud Woods, Gurjum, Cypriol, Patchouli, and Vetiver, the whole sublimated by a sensual, leathery base of Labdanum, Ambrette, Orientalgris, Castoreum, and Civet, shot through with a highly distinctive and unusual note of Valerian." - a note from the brand.

long_description: â€œInspired by the legend of NÃ¼wa, the gentle and kindly Chinese goddess, who is said to have created woman and man; and according to the myth she taught her people to be creative and wise, introduced beauty through music, song and dance, and filled the field flowers with fragrance. This tender liquid narrative will seduce the soul.â€Â - a note from the brand.

short_description: Madison Pour Femme  by  Roja Dove  is a Oriental fragrance for women.  Madison Pour Femme  was launched in 2017. The nose behind this fragrance is Roja Dove. Top notes are Mandarin Orange and Bergamot; middle notes are Ylang-Ylang, May Rose, Violet, Heliotrope, Black Currant, Jasmine and Labdanum; base notes are Musk, Vanilla, Cedar, Orris, Incense, Pink Pepper, Sandalwood, Benzoin and Patchouli.
long_description: ""I fell under Rojaâ€™s spell the moment I met him. Since then, our store and Roja Parfums have had an unbreakable bond. It would not be a celebration without the golden elixirs of the finest fragrances in the world, and I feel so lucky to have our very own creations to mark this special milestone - two exclusive scents which encapsulate ten years of MADISON absolute beauty." Madeleine Florescu, Owner of MADISON absolute beauty â€œPerfume is about capturing a special moment in time, a memory you want to hold on to forever. I was thrilled when Madeleine asked me to create a scent to celebrate ten years of MADISON absolute beauty â€“ but I couldnâ€™t create just one, it had to be two â€“ one for men and one for women, evocative of this storeâ€™s clientele, who exist for only the finest the world has to offer. I hope these scents capture this very special moment for MADISON, creating a memory that can be revisited in years to come â€“ with just one breath of perfume." - a note from the brand.

perfume_name: Kingdom of Saudi Arabia Roja Dove
short_description: Kingdom of Saudi Arabia  by  Roja Dove  is a Oriental Spicy fragrance for women and men.  Kingdom of Saudi Arabia  was launched in 2017. The nose behind this fragrance is Roja Dove. Top notes are Mandarin Orange, Artemisia, Lime and Aldehydes; middle notes are Strawberry, Banana, Raspberry, Plum, Apple, Black Currant, Rose de Mai, Chamomile, Violet, Jasmine and Geranium; base notes are Agarwood (Oud), Leather, Cotton Candy, Cinnamon, Vanilla, Cacao Pod, Saffron, Balsam Fir, Musk, Sandalwood, Cedar, Pink Pepper, Violet Leaf, Cloves, Oakmoss and Patchouli.
long_description:
"A blend of Lime, Mandarin, Artemisia, and sparkling Aldehydes adds its freshness to a bouquet of Rose, Geranium, Jasmine, Chamomile, and Violet, further sweetened by Plum, Raspberry, Blackcurrant, Strawberry, Banana, Apple, and a Candyfloss Accord, which is enlivened by Pink Pepper, Cinnamon, Clove, and Saffron, warmed by a base of Cedar, Sandal, and Aoud Woods, Patchouli, and Oakmoss, where Fir Balsam, Vanilla and Cocoa add their softness, the whole underscored by a sensual blend of Leather and Musk." - a note from the brand.

H Aoud  by  Roja Dove  is a Oriental Floral fragrance for women and men.  H Aoud  was launched in 2014. The nose behind this fragrance is Roja Dove. Top notes are Cypriol Oil or Nagarmotha, Gurjan balsam, Bergamot and Valerian; middle notes are Rose, Nutmeg, Oregano, Jasmine and Geranium; base notes are Patchouli, Vetiver, Agarwood (Oud), Labdanum, Birch and Benzoin.
long_description:
â€œI loved creating â€˜Hâ€™â€”The Exclusive Aoud&mdahs;for Harrods. I have blended some of the rarest, richest, and most exotic materials available to capture the spirit of this peerless store. I hope my rich, sumptuous creation embraces the spirit of the store itselfâ€”the finest in the world.â€â€”Roja Dove. 
 H Aoud arrives in a luxurious, transparent flacon with a cap with Swarovski crystals in emerald green color. Its composition provides an unusual blend of gurjum, cypriol (nagarmotha) and valerian, with an aim to enable warmth and depth to accords of patchouli, vetiver and oud wood. Refreshment in the composition is brought by bergamot, geranium, rose and jasmine, while a spicy twist originates from nutmeg and oregano. Additional warmth is provided by labdanum and benzoin combined with birch tree, as an additional decoration to the floral-spicy heart of the composition. 
 Fragrance H Aoud was presented exclusively at Harrods Salon de Parfum. The flacon arrives as 50 ml perfume concentration.

perfume_name: Fortnum & Mason Taif Oud Roja Dove

perfume_name: Enigma Pour Femme Essence De Parfum Roja Dove
short_description: Enigma Pour Femme Essence De Parfum  by  Roja Dove  is a Oriental Floral fragrance for women.  Enigma Pour Femme Essence De Parfum  was launched in 2021. Top note is Bergamot; middle notes are May Rose, Peach, Ylang-Ylang, Heliotrope, Geranium, Neroli and Jasmine; base notes are Musk, Vanilla, Sandalwood, Ambergris, Patchouli and Orris.
long_description:
Soft powdery whispers of Orris and Musk dances around a central note of elegant Rose de Mai. But all is not what it seems as an explosion of juicy Peach â€“ natureâ€™s forbidden fruit - hints at something more mysterious to sink your teeth into. Beneath this portrait of refined femininity, something deeper and more exotic weaves its way out of the shadows. A damp, earthy accent of Patchouli brings a carnal edge to the sensuality of Sandalwood, which is taken to dizzying heights with the animalic impulse of Orientalgris. At once familiar and yet utterly ambiguous, the inability to put your finger on who that woman is, is the enigma itself. 
 An elegantly seductive perfume, Enigma has the magical ability to envelope the wearer in its exotic charm and enchant any who fall into its path. Based around the seductive qualities of Peach and Sandalwood, a swathe of this voluptuous fruit contributes a velvety-smooth sweetness to the depth of this legendary skin-mimicking wood. A touch of citrus Bergamot alongside vibrant Heliotrope and Geranium lend a light freshness which is made rich and indulgent by a heart of Rose and Ylang Ylang, whilst intensely sensual notes of Orientalgris and Musk linger in the shadows and form a perfume that gives the wearer a notable je ne sais quoi.

perfume_name: Elysium Pour Homme Parfum Roja Dove
short_description: Elysium Pour Homme Parfum   by  Roja Dove  is a fragrance for men.  Elysium Pour Homme Parfum   was launched in 2017. The nose behind this fragrance is Roja Dove. Top notes are Grapefruit, Lemon, Galbanum and Lime; middle notes are Apple, Lily-of-the-Valley, Pink Pepper, Woody Notes, Jasmine and Rose; base notes are Ambergris, Musk, Leather, Labdanum, Benzoin and Vanilla.
long_description: "An ultra-fresh citrus blend of zesty lemon, tangy grapefruit and lime is further invigorated by leafy galbanum and the sweet harmony of lily of the valley, rose, and jasmine in Roja's Elysiuim Pour Homme eau de Parfum.Made fruity by crisp apple, the heart is warmed by pink pepper and woody notes, where a soft base of benzoin and smooth vanilla is made sensual with labdanum and ambergris which reinforces the musk in the top." - a note from the brand.

ChyprÃ© Extraordinaire  by  Roja Dove  is a Chypre Floral fragrance for women and men.  ChyprÃ© Extraordinaire  was launched in 2018. The nose behind this fragrance is Roja Dove. Top notes are Aldehydes and Bergamot; middle notes are Peach, Ylang-Ylang, Plum, Tuberose, Jasmine, Violet, Rose de Mai, Cassia, Geranium, Heliotrope, Labdanum and Orange Blossom; base notes are Oakmoss, Civet, Leather, Orris, Musk, Amber, Cumin, Patchouli, Benzoin, Cedar, Tonka Bean, Clove, Sandalwood, Vanilla and Styrax.
long_description: â€œMy love of ChyprÃ© scents is grounded in my childhood. I find them compelling - their magnetism impossible to escape. Impeccably refined and ultra-tailored, they command attention and demand respect in the most understated way. Inherently difficult to perfect, I love the accord, and all the challenges they present. In this composition I have blended the mossy warmth of a classical ChyprÃ©, with an unexpected bouquet of sensual white flowers, freshened with a dynamic burst of citrus notes. For those who share my love of ChyprÃ© scents, this contrasting blend of materials is totally unexpected â€“ and the reason this creation is truly extraordinary.â€ - a note from the brand.

long_description: â€œFragrance is like a magical elixir: Invisible, a single drop can transform you into a goddess. It has the power to make you feel irresistible, confident, and seductive - where anything is possible. This magical elixir exudes effortless sensuality - giving you the power to light up a room, to leave an impression, and to get what you want.â€ - a note from the brand.

long_description: â€œDangerous not just for those wearing it, but for those who smell it on them. Aromatic Lemon, Lavender and Tarragon create a fresh and willing invitation, but beware, as sensual aphrodisiacs lurk in the shadows, daring you to breathe it in a little deeper. The sweetness of Vanilla and Jasmine contrast against the dry, earthy warmth of Cedarwood and Patchouli, tempting you to lean in a little closer, and succumb. Just remember, you have been warnedâ€¦â€Â -Â a note from the brand.

long_description: â€œ1819 celebrates 5 years of Londonâ€™s Burlington Arcade being home to the flagship Roja Parfums boutique. An iconic British institution for over 200 years, the Burlington Arcade is an unparalleled destination for the discovery of opulence. Every step down the Arcade is a chance to discover something new. 1819 â€“ the year it opened to the public â€“ pays homage The Burlington Arcade being the perfect home for our award-winning perfumery, where the finest fragrances in the world wait to be discovered.â€ - a note from the brand.

Ahlam  by  Roja Dove  is a Oriental fragrance for women.  Ahlam  was launched in 2018. The nose behind this fragrance is Roja Dove. Top note is Lemon; middle notes are Rose de Mai, Violet, Ylang-Ylang, Geranium and Jasmine; base notes are Powdery Notes, Agarwood (Oud), Almond, Vanilla, Ambergris, Orris, Musk, Saffron, Rhubarb, Sandalwood and Patchouli.
long_description:
"To create her very own exclusive scent, Ahlam Alshamsi turned to her favourite perfumery house - Roja Parfums - because a queen deserves to work with the best. Perfumer Roja Dove created a composition befitting of a world-renowned star, capturing Ahlamâ€™s inimitable personality. This creation is original, glamourous, and totally unforgettable - This is Ahlamâ€™s scent. 
 "I was delighted when Ahlam asked if I would create her exclusive perfume, and thrilled to learn that she has adored Roja Parfums for many years. Ahlam could have approached anybody - but she came to me - and that is a wonderful compliment. I will always remember our first meeting. Warm, easy, and fun, it was as if we had known each other for years. I love the scent I have created for Ahlam. Ahlam loves the scent I have created for her. I hope you love it as much as we do." - Roja Dove" - a note from the brand.

short_description: A Goodnight Kiss  by  Roja Dove  is a Oriental Floral fragrance for women.  A Goodnight Kiss  was launched in 2015. The nose behind this fragrance is Roja Dove. Top note is Bergamot; middle notes are Heliotrope, Jasmine, Ylang-Ylang, Rose, Neroli, Geranium and Peach; base notes are Orris, Ambergris, Musk, Sandalwood, Vanilla and Patchouli.
long_description:
"A Goodnight Kiss is the celebration of how precious a small exchange of affection can be, and the lasting effect it can have upon us. The fragrant embodiment of humanity's most intimate gesture -the soft, evanescent whisper of A Goodnight Kiss". Roja Dove 
 A blend of green notes and citrus bergamot adds its freshness to a rich bouquet of spicy carnation, rose, jasmine, ylang ylang, orange blossom, May flower, and violet, where an unusual note of rice powder is enlivened by clove and other spice notes. Warmed by cedarwood, the whole fragrance nestles on a bed of leather notes and powdery orris, with whispers of sensual musk.

short_description: A Midsummer Dream  by  Roja Dove  is a fragrance for women and men.  A Midsummer Dream  was launched in 2016. The nose behind this fragrance is Roja Dove. Top notes are Grapefruit and Bergamot; middle notes are elemi, Cardamom, Moss, Pink Pepper, Orange Blossom, Rose and Patchouli; base notes are Benzoin, Vetiver, Vanilla, Orris, Cedar, Musk and Carrot Seeds.

Open  by  Roger & Gallet  is a Woody Aromatic fragrance for men.  Open  was launched in 1985. Top notes are Lavender, Amalfi Lemon and Bergamot; middle notes are Thyme and Sage; base notes are Tobacco, Vetiver and Patchouli.

Fleurs d'Amour  by  Roger & Gallet  is a Oriental Floral fragrance for women.  Fleurs d'Amour  was launched in 1902. Top notes are Aldehydes, Bergamot, Orange, Geranium, Galbanum and Lemon; middle notes are Violet, Honey, Carnation, Ylang-Ylang, Jasmine, Orange Blossom, Lily-of-the-Valley, Lily and Rose; base notes are Opoponax, Civet, Oakmoss, Sandalwood, Musk, Vetiver, Tonka Bean, Patchouli, Benzoin, Ambergris and Vanilla.

51 Pour Femme  by  Roja Dove  is a Oriental fragrance for women. The nose behind this fragrance is Roja Dove. Top note is Bergamot; middle notes are Ylang-Ylang, Gardenia, Raspberry, Tuberose, Jasmine, Rose, Orange Blossom and Lily-of-the-Valley; base notes are Vanilla, Cashmere Wood, Sandalwood, Benzoin, Orris Root, Violet Leaf, Cinnamon, Anise, Patchouli and Cloves.
long_description: This collection also includes Supreme Hair Mists.

short_description: Amber Aoud  by  Roja Dove  is a Oriental Spicy fragrance for women and men.  Amber Aoud  was launched in 2012. The nose behind this fragrance is Roja Dove. Top notes are Bergamot, Lime and Lemon; middle notes are Rose, Fig, Ylang-Ylang and Jasmine; base notes are Agarwood (Oud), Ambergris, Saffron, Cinnamon, Civet, Sandalwood, Birch, Orris Root, Musk, Patchouli and Oakmoss.

Eau Sensuelle  by  Rochas  is a Floral fragrance for women.  Eau Sensuelle  was launched in 2009. The nose behind this fragrance is Jean-Michel Duriez. Top notes are Blood Orange, Mango and Bergamot; middle notes are Orange Blossom, Jasmine and Orris Root; base notes are Pink Pepper, Dried Fruits and Musk.
long_description: Eau Sensuelle was presented in 2009, as a successor of Eau de Rochas. It is composed of citrusy zests of red orange, bergamot and mango, along with a floral wave of Indian Sambac jasmine and powdery orris root. A romantic, spicy trail introduces accords of dried fruit, pink pepper and sensual, white musk. The fragrance is available as 50 and 100 ml (1.7 and 3.4 oz) EDT. Perfumer of this edition is Jean-Michel Duriez.

short_description: Mademoiselle Rochas  by  Rochas  is a Floral Fruity fragrance for women.  Mademoiselle Rochas  was launched in 2017. The nose behind this fragrance is Anne Flipo. Top notes are Candy Apple, Black Currant, Orange and Lemon; middle notes are Rose and Egyptian Jasmine; base notes are Vanilla, Musk, Sandalwood and Ambergris.
long_description:
The new feminine fragrance by Rochas, Mademoiselle Rochas, pays tribute to the classic Madame Rochas from 1960. The fragrance comes out in March 2017, under the license from Interparfums, developed by perfumer Anne Flipo of IFF. Mademoiselle Rochas reportedly represents the playful spirit of a young Parisian woman and the epitome of French Chic. 
 Sweet and fruity aromas of black currant and candied apple from the top of the composition are leading to the floral heart of rose petals and Egyptian jasmine. The base reveals tones of ambergris, sandalwood and chantilly musk. Mademoiselle Rochas is a fragrance of a young woman bright, cheerful and bubbly. 
 The face of the campaign is actress Noemie Schmidt. It is available in a round glass pink bottle with a textured edge as a 30, 50 and 90 ml Eau de Parfum.

short_description: Byzance  by  Rochas  is a Oriental Spicy fragrance for women.  Byzance  was launched in 1987. Byzance was created by Nicolas Mamounas and Alberto Morillas. Top notes are Aldehydes, Spices, Carnation, Cardamom, Basil, Mandarin Orange, Lemon and Green Notes; middle notes are Tuberose, Ylang-Ylang, Turkish Rose, Jasmine, Orris Root, Anise and Lily-of-the-Valley; base notes are Sandalwood, Heliotrope, Amber, Vanilla, Musk and Cedar.

Secret de Rochas  by  Rochas  is a Chypre Fruity fragrance for women.  Secret de Rochas  was launched in 2014. The nose behind this fragrance is Jean-Michel Duriez. Top notes are Peach, Mango, Passionfruit and Green Notes; middle notes are Osmanthus and Jasmine; base notes are Musk, Oakmoss and Patchouli.
long_description:
Secret de Rochas is the latest perfume creation of the house of Rochas. In the process of developing this fragrance Jean - Michel Duriez had in mind the tradition of the house and French elegance that it symbolizes. 70 years after the launch of their most famous Femme fragrance, Secret de Rochas is emerging as a new, modern vision of femininity.
 
 
The fragrance is based on a formula of osmanthus mixed with fruits, moss and woods. The composition is chypre with shades of flowers and fruits. It opens with juicy exotic mango, peach and passion fruit with a touch of greenery. The heart promises accord of osmanthus, jasmine and a â€œsecret ingredient.â€ Its base creates a classical harmony of moss, patchouli and musk. 
 Its elegant cylindrical bottle is colored in shades of apricot. The packaging shows the famous quote by Marcel Rochas: "One must smell a woman before even seeing herâ€ ("On doit respirer une femme avant mÃªme de l' avoir vue"). The face of the perfume is French actress and singer Cecile Cassel.  
 
 The fragrance is available as 30, 50 and 100 ml Eau de Parfum .

short_description: Femme Rochas  by  Rochas  is a Chypre Fruity fragrance for women.  Femme Rochas  was launched in 1944. The nose behind this fragrance is Edmond Roudnitska. Top notes are Plum, Peach, Cinnamon, Apricot, Brazilian Rosewood, Bergamot and Lemon; middle notes are Cloves, Carnation, Ylang-Ylang, Rosemary, Rose, Iris and Jasmine; base notes are Oakmoss, Leather, Benzoin, Amber, Patchouli, Musk and Vanilla.
long_description:
Edmond Roudnitska made Femme Rochas in Paris during the War in 1943. Femme represents a real masterpiece with its warmth of a womanâ€™s gentle skin and dense note of plum. The composition is based on the harmony of aldehides, fruit, wood, and musk notes. The dryness of chypre notes is softened by the purple plum.
The richness of tropical fruits is followed by the rich scent of sandal. Femme Rochas is a splendid perfume which is not aimed at every person, more at a femme fatale. The perfume was reconstructed in 1989 and has become lighter and more gourmand thanks to the peach note in harmony with plum.
The notes are: bergamot, peach, pear, rose, an immortal, jasmine, ylang-ylang, grey amber, musk, oakmoss and sandal. The lovely bottle recalls a woman's curves.

short_description: Absolu  by  Rochas  is a Oriental Woody fragrance for women.  Absolu  was launched in 2002. The nose behind this fragrance is Jacques Cavallier Belletrud. Top notes are Mandarin Orange and Fig Leaf; middle notes are Orange Blossom, Lily, Pepper and Rose; base notes are Benzoin, Tolu Balsam, Labdanum and Cedar.
long_description:
This Woodsy oriental fragrance from Rochas was introduced in 2002 with the perfumer Jacques Cavallier. The perfume opens with the notes of tangerine and fig leaves, then the floral waves of lily, neroli, black pepper and rose follow. The base notes introduce accords of incense, benzoin, cedar and toluene balm. It is available as 30, 50 and 75 ml edp, along with the 200 ml body milk and shower gel. Â 
Â

short_description: Splendid Vanilla  by  Roberto Cavalli  is a Oriental Floral fragrance for women and men.  Splendid Vanilla  was launched in 2019. The nose behind this fragrance is Amelie Jacquin. Top notes are Rose and Black Pepper; middle notes are Cypriol Oil or Nagarmotha and Magnolia; base notes are Vanilla, Patchouli and Cedar.
Supreme Sandal  by  Roberto Cavalli  is a Oriental Floral fragrance for women and men.  Supreme Sandal  was launched in 2016.
